T13D4312-2:35b-24: de bzhin du rus pa'i tshigs la gnas shing brten
T13D4312-2:35b-25: pa gang yin pa de dag dbug cing gtsags bus
T13D4312-2:35b-27: rtsa ni bdun brgya de rnams las //
T13D4312-2:35b-28: bzhi char phrag ni so sor rgyu //
T13D4312-2:35b-29: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan khrag / nad med khrag ni de ltar gnas //
T13D4312-2:35b-30: de ni lus la phan 'dogs te //
T13D4312-2:35b-31: gzhan du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:35b-33: rtsa bdun brgya yod pa de rnams las rang rang
T13D4312-2:35b-34: gi bzhi cha ste brgya bdun cu rtsa lngar rlung
T13D4312-2:35b-35: re res mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi khrag dang
T13D4312-2:35b-36: nad med pa'i khrag so sor rgyu ba yin no
T13D4312-2:35b-37: // de ltar rlung la sogs pa'i nad gnas shing
T13D4312-2:35b-38: snyoms par 'jug pa'i ni lus la phan 'dogs shing
T13D4312-2:35b-39: gnas par byed pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:35b-40: gzhan du ste go rims 'chol zhing 'khrugs par gnas
T13D4312-2:35b-41: na lus la gnod pa skyed cing nad du 'gyur
T13D4312-2:35b-42: ba yin no // de la gnag dang dmar dang phra //
T13D4312-2:35b-43: skad cig re re gang zhing stongs //
T13D4312-2:35b-44: mgul ba rlung gi khrag rtsa yin //
T13D4312-2:35b-46: rtsa de dag gi nang nas rtsa'i mdog gnag pa dang /
T13D4312-2:36a-0: skad cig re re zhing gang @36a * //
T13D4312-2:36a-2: rlung ni g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pas na lan 'ga' ni gang zhing rgyas par snang la /
T13D4312-2:36a-3: lan 'ga' ni stong zhing khong stong gi tshul du skad cig re rer 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-2:36a-4: de bzhin du rtsa gang shin tu 'gul zhing 'phar
T13D4312-2:36a-5: ba gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khrag rgyu
T13D4312-2:36a-7: reg tshe tsha zhing myur du rgyu //
T13D4312-2:36a-8: mdog sngo ser por 'dug pa ni //
T13D4312-2:36a-9: mkhris pa'i khrag rtsa'i mtshan ma yin //
T13D4312-2:36a-11: mkhris pa'i khrag rgyu ba'i rtsa yin pa de ni
T13D4312-2:36a-12: reg na tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa yin
T13D4312-2:36a-13: gyi grang bar gnas pa ma yin pa dang //
T13D4312-2:36a-14: de bzhin du myur du rgyu zhing 'bab pa dang /
T13D4312-2:36a-15: de bzhin du mdog sngon po'am /
T13D4312-2:36a-17: dkar snum brtan grang bad kan rtsa //
T13D4312-2:36a-19: bad kan gyi khrag rgyu ba'i rtsa ni 'di ltar gnas te /
T13D4312-2:36a-22: rgyu ba brtan zhing 'gyur ba med pa dang /
T13D4312-2:36a-23: reg na grang ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:36a-26: ldan pa'i nad dang 'dus pa'i nad kyi rtsa'i mtshan nyid ni 'dren mar rgyu ba yin te /
T13D4312-2:36a-29: mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa'am /
T13D4312-2:36a-30: gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni
T13D4312-2:36a-31: rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dren mar snang ba yin
T13D4312-2:36a-32: no // mi mngon mnyam gnas snum pa dang //
T13D4312-2:36a-33: mdog dmar khrag rtsa nad med yin //
T13D4312-2:36a-35: rtsa mi mngon zhing nang du nub pa dang /
T13D4312-2:36a-36: mnyam zhing snyoms par gnas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:36a-37: rtsub cing snum bag med pa dang /
T13D4312-2:36a-38: khrag gi mdog dmar ba'i rtsa ni nad med pa'i khrag rgyu ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:36a-39: rtsa bo che ni nyi shu bzhi //
T13D4312-2:36a-40: lte ba la ni brten pa yin //
T13D4312-2:36a-41: de rnams kyis bsor lte ba ni //
T13D4312-2:36a-42: 'khor lo'i lte ba rtsibs bskor mtshungs //
T13D4312-2:36a-43: des ni steng 'og thad ka ru //
T13D4312-2:36a-46: lus la rtsa bo che nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod
T13D4312-2:36a-47: pa gang yin pa de ni lte ba la brten
T13D4312-2:36a-49: de yang de rnams kyis lte ba yongs su bskor bar gnas te /
T13D4312-2:36a-50: ji ltar shing rta'i lte ba gang yin pa de
T13D4312-2:36a-51: rtsibs kyis kun nas bskor cing gnas pa dang mtshungs
T13D4312-2:36a-52: pa yin no // de lta bu'i rtsa bo che
T13D4312-2:36a-53: des ni lus kyi steng dang 'og dang thad ka
T13D4312-2:36b-0: dag tu gyes @36b pas phung po ni rjes su
T13D4312-2:36b-1: 'dzin cing 'tsho bar byed pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:36b-2: rtsa bo che de dag kyang kun dga' ra ba'i
T13D4312-2:36b-3: chu 'dren pa'i wa lta bu'am zhing gi yur ba
T13D4312-2:36b-5: rtsa bo che de dag las bcu ni steng du 'gro ba yin la /
T13D4312-2:36b-7: bzhi ni thad kar 'gro ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:36b-8: bu ga sna dang rna ba gnyis //
T13D4312-2:36b-9: mig gnyis kha rkub pho mtshan no //
T13D4312-2:36b-11: skyes pa la ni bu ga dgu yod de /
T13D4312-2:36b-18: bud med nu ma gnyis khrag sgo //
T13D4312-2:36b-19: gsum gyis lhag par gyur pa yin //
T13D4312-2:36b-21: bud med rnams ni snga ma las lhag par gyur
T13D4312-2:36b-22: pa'i bu ga gsum yod de nu ma gnyis kyi
T13D4312-2:36b-23: bu ga dang / zla mtshan rgyu ba'i bu ga'o //
T13D4312-2:36b-24: nang gi srog gi gnas gyur pa'i //
T13D4312-2:36b-25: bu ga bcu gsum yod par bshad //
T13D4312-2:36b-26: srog dang lus zungs dri mchu //
T13D4312-2:36b-29: de bzhin du nang gi bu ga snga ma las
T13D4312-2:36b-30: gzhan pa srog la sogs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i
T13D4312-2:36b-31: bu ga bcu gsum yod de /
T13D4312-2:36b-32: de la srog ces bya ba'i rlung ni srog gi gnas su rgyu'o //
T13D4312-2:36b-33: lus zungs rgyu ba rnams su ni dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rgyu'o //
T13D4312-2:36b-34: dri ma rgyu ba'i gnas su bshang ba dang gci ba dang rdul rgyu'o //
T13D4312-2:36b-35: chu rgyu ba'i gnas su ni chu 'thungs pa rgyu'o //
T13D4312-2:36b-36: zas rgyu ba'i gnas su ni zas zos pa rnams rgyu ste /
T13D4312-2:36b-37: de ltar na rnam pa bcu gsum yin no //
T13D4312-2:36b-38: zas rgyu mi mthun bstan pa yin //
T13D4312-2:36b-39: de la gnod pas nad skyed la //
T13D4312-2:36b-40: skyon med dag pas bde bar byed //
T13D4312-2:36b-42: bu ga de dag zas dang spyod lam mi mthun
T13D4312-2:36b-43: zhing phan pa ma yin ba bsten pas de la
T13D4312-2:36b-44: gnod par gyur cing 'khrugs par byas pa las nad
T13D4312-2:36b-45: rnams skyed par 'gyur la skyon med cing dag pa'i
T13D4312-2:36b-46: zas dang spyod lam bsten pas gnod pa med na
T13D4312-2:36b-47: bde ba nyid du 'gyur zhing nad med pa skyed
T13D4312-2:36b-48: bar byed do // rang gi lus zungs mdog mnyam zhing //
T13D4312-2:36b-49: zlum dang sbom dang phra ba dang //
T13D4312-2:36b-50: bu ga'i dbyibs kyi ring po ste //
T13D4312-2:36b-51: lo ma'i rtsa 'phros lta bu yin //
T13D4312-2:36b-53: rang gi lus zungs kyi gzhir gyur pa'i bu ga
T13D4312-2:36b-54: gang ba ste nad pa'i lus zungs de dang mdog
T13D4312-2:36b-55: mnyam zhing mtshungs pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:36b-56: des na dangs ma rgyu ba'i bu ga ni lus
T13D4312-2:36b-57: zungs kyi dangs ma bu ga dang kha dog mtshungs
T13D4312-2:37a-2: bu ga de dag thams cad las bu ga la la ni zlum po yin la /
T13D4312-2:37a-3: bu ga la la ni sbom pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:37a-4: la la ni phra zhing chung ba yin te /
T13D4312-2:37a-5: bu ga de dag thams cad kyi dbyibs ni ring por gnas shing /
T13D4312-2:37a-6: rtsa sbubs de dag kyang lo ma'i rtsa rgyus kyi
T13D4312-2:37a-7: ri mo dang mthun pa'i ring thung du mar gyes
T13D4312-2:37a-8: pa yin no // zas dang spyod lam dag gis gang //
T13D4312-2:37a-9: nad kyi mthu dang mnyam gyur dang //
T13D4312-2:37a-10: gang yang lus zungs mi mnyam ste //
T13D4312-2:37a-11: bu ga'i rgyun la gnod byed yin //
T13D4312-2:37a-13: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T13D4312-2:37a-14: can gyi zas gang rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi
T13D4312-2:37a-15: mthu rtsub ba la sogs pa dang mnyam zhing mtshungs
T13D4312-2:37a-16: par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bu ga
T13D4312-2:37a-17: rnams 'gags shing gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin no
T13D4312-2:37a-18: // spyod lam ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ste /
T13D4312-2:37a-19: de yang nad kyi mthu dang cha mnyam par gyur
T13D4312-2:37a-20: na bu ga rnams la gnod cing 'gags pa'i rgyu
T13D4312-2:37a-21: yin no // de bzhin du lus zungs bdun po
T13D4312-2:37a-22: zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa de'i mthu dang
T13D4312-2:37a-23: nus pa mi mnyam zhing yon tan tha dad par
T13D4312-2:37a-24: gyur pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bu ga'i
T13D4312-2:37a-25: rgyun la gnod cing 'gags pa'i rgyu yin no //
T13D4312-2:37a-27: rtsa ni mdud pa chags pa'am //
T13D4312-2:37a-28: lam gzhan dag tu 'gro ba ni //
T13D4312-2:37a-29: bu ga'i rgyu 'khrugs mtshan nyid yin //
T13D4312-2:37a-31: bu ga la mang du byung ba ni ji ltar
T13D4312-2:37a-32: gcin 'bab pa'i bu ga las gcin snyi ba'i nad
T13D4312-2:37a-33: ltar mang du byung ba na /
T13D4312-2:37a-34: 'gags pa ni mi 'byung ba'am cung zad byung ba ste gcin sri ba'i nad lta bu'o //
T13D4312-2:37a-35: de bzhin du bshang ba 'byung ba'i bu ga las
T13D4312-2:37a-36: tshad pa 'khru ba ltar bshang gci lhag par 'khru
T13D4312-2:37a-38: 'gags pa ni bshang ba cung zad byung ba'am /
T13D4312-2:37a-39: yang na rtug 'gags kyi nad ltar thams cad nas
T13D4312-2:37a-40: thams cad du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ni
T13D4312-2:37a-41: bu ga'i rgyu 'khrugs shing gnod pa dang ldan pa'i
T13D4312-2:37a-42: mtshan nyid yin te de bzhin gzhan dag la yang
T13D4312-2:37a-43: sbyar bar bya'o // de bzhin du rtsa la mdud pa chags par gyur pa dang /
T13D4312-2:37a-44: de bzhin du lam gzhan du 'gro ba ste /
T13D4312-2:37a-45: rang gi rgyu'i 'am ma spangs nas lam gzhan du
T13D4312-2:37b-0: 'gro ba de yang bu ga la @37b gnod pa
T13D4312-2:37b-1: yod cing 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T13D4312-2:37b-2: padma'i rtsa ba phra mo las //
T13D4312-2:37b-3: ring du rgyu bar byed pa ltar //
T13D4312-2:37b-4: gang gis dangs ma nyer 'phel ba //
T13D4312-2:37b-5: lus kyi sgo ni bu ga yin //
T13D4312-2:37b-7: ji ltar padma'i rtsa ba'i sbubs shin tu phra ba'i
T13D4312-2:37b-8: bu ga las ring du rgyu bar byed cing thams
T13D4312-2:37b-9: cad la khyab par byed pa de bzhin du bu
T13D4312-2:37b-10: ga'i sgo gang nas lus 'di la dangs ma nye
T13D4312-2:37b-11: bar sogs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas gang
T13D4312-2:37b-12: lus ma lus pa khyab par byed pa de ni
T13D4312-2:37b-14: bu ga rnams ni brtol gyur na //
T13D4312-2:37b-15: 'dar myos lto sbos lkugs dang rims //
T13D4312-2:37b-16: sla dang gzer dang bshang gci 'gags //
T13D4312-2:37b-19: bu ga brtol zhing phyung bar gyur nas 'dar ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
T13D4312-2:37b-20: yang na 'chi zhing dus byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:37b-21: de la 'dar ba ni lus g-yo zhing 'gul ba'o //
T13D4312-2:37b-22: myos pa ni sems stor ba'o //
T13D4312-2:37b-23: lto spos pa ni dbugs kyis khengs pa'o //
T13D4312-2:37b-24: de bas sman pas bu ga brtol //
T13D4312-2:37b-25: re thag bcad de gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:37b-26: 'phral du rma byung cho ga yis //
T13D4312-2:37b-27: 'bad de zug rngu dbyung bar bya //
T13D4312-2:37b-29: de ltar srog dang bral ba'i nyes pa de bas
T13D4312-2:37b-30: na sman pa dag gis bu ga brtol ba'i nad
T13D4312-2:37b-31: pa la re thag bcad cing bzlog ste bya ba
T13D4312-2:37b-32: 'dis ni nges par 'chi ba yin te zhes smra
T13D4312-2:37b-33: la / mtshon gyis zug rngu de phyung nas 'bad de gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:37b-34: de yang ji ltar dbyung zhe na /
T13D4312-2:37b-35: 'phral du zug rngu dbyung ba'i cho ga sngar bshad pa ltar dbyung bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:37b-36: zas 'ju byed pa mkhris pa ni //
T13D4312-2:37b-37: 'ju byed yin zhes sngar bshad do //
T13D4312-2:37b-39: zas 'ju bar byed pa ni mkhris pa lnga'i khyad
T13D4312-2:37b-40: par 'ju bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mkhris pa
T13D4312-2:37b-41: yin no zhes sngar nad kyi bye brag shes par
T13D4312-2:37b-42: bya ba'i le'u las bshad pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:37b-43: nad dang lus zungs dri ma yi //
T13D4312-2:37b-44: drod yin zhes ni rgyun shes zer //
T13D4312-2:37b-46: drang srong rgyun shes kyi bus ni nad dang lus
T13D4312-2:37b-47: zungs dang dri ma rnams kyi drod de rlung la
T13D4312-2:37b-49: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams dang /
T13D4312-2:37b-50: bshang gci zhes bya ba'i dri ma de rnams kyi drod ni me drod de /
T13D4312-2:37b-51: nad dang lus zungs dang dri ma dang 'dus ba
T13D4312-2:37b-52: las byung ba'i nang gi me drod ji skad du
T13D4312-2:38a-3: de ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing //
T13D4312-2:38a-6: 'ju bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mkhris pa dang /
T13D4312-2:38a-7: me drod ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing /
T13D4312-2:38a-8: zas de nyid 'dzin cing chags par byed pas na 'dzin par byed pa'o ;
T13D4312-2:38a-10: de nyid thang la 'bar gzhung gis //
T13D4312-2:38a-11: mkhris pa 'dzin pa'i cha ru bshad //
T13D4312-2:38a-14: drang srong thang la 'bar gyis gzhung ngam phyogs kyis de mkhris pa 'dzin pa'i cha yin no //
T13D4312-2:38a-16: tshe dang nad med brtson gzi mdangs //
T13D4312-2:38a-17: lus zungs me drod stobs 'phel byed //
T13D4312-2:38a-18: zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor zhugs pa //
T13D4312-2:38a-19: zas kyi lam gyi sgo gtan yin //
T13D4312-2:38a-21: 'dzin pa de nyid zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgo na
T13D4312-2:38a-22: 'dug par gyur na tshe 'phel bar byed pa dang
T13D4312-2:38a-23: / nad med pa la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:38a-24: de bzhin du zas kyi lam zhu ba'i gnas kyi
T13D4312-2:38a-25: nang du 'gro ba'i gnas byed pa yin te sgo
T13D4312-2:38a-26: byed pa'i gags byed pa ni sgo gtan yin pa
T13D4312-2:38a-27: dang 'dra bar 'dir yang zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor
T13D4312-2:38a-28: 'dug ste ma zhu ba'i gnas dang zhu ba'i gnas
T13D4312-2:38a-29: kyi bar du gnas nas des kyang me'i drod nang
T13D4312-2:38a-30: du skyed pas ma zhu ba'i gnas su 'gro bar
T13D4312-2:38a-31: bdog pa'i zas stobs kyis bkag nas mkhris pa'i me
T13D4312-2:38a-32: drod kyis smin cing skem par byed do //
T13D4312-2:38a-33: de ni stobs ldan zos ba rnams //
T13D4312-2:38a-34: zhu nas thur du 'dren par byed //
T13D4312-2:38a-35: stobs zhan gyur na kha zas ni //
T13D4312-2:38a-36: ma smin nyid du 'byung bar byed //
T13D4312-2:38a-38: 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba ste stobs dang
T13D4312-2:38a-39: ldan par gyur na kha zas zos pa rnams ma
T13D4312-2:38a-40: zhu ba'i gnas su bkag cing stobs kyis bkag nas
T13D4312-2:38a-41: smin cing zhu bar byas te /
T13D4312-2:38a-42: de'i 'og tu zas de dri ma'i rnam par zhu ba'i gnas su 'dren par byed la /
T13D4312-2:38a-43: de ni stobs dang ldan pa las gyur gyi stobs gzhan las ni ma yin no //
T13D4312-2:38a-44: gal te 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ste ;
T13D4312-2:38a-45: stobs zhan cing nyam chung bar gyur ba la /
T13D4312-2:38a-46: nad kyis nyen pa yin na /
T13D4312-2:38a-47: kha zas ma zhu zhing ma smin pa nyid du 'byung zhing dor bar byed do //
T13D4312-2:38a-48: 'dzin byed stobs ni me drod de //
T13D4312-2:38a-49: de yang 'dzin byed stobs can yin //
T13D4312-2:38a-50: de bas me drod nyams gyur na //
T13D4312-2:38a-51: 'dzin byed nad ni skyed par byed //
T13D4312-2:38b-1: 'dzin byed de'i stobs ni 'ju bar byed pa zhes
T13D4312-2:38b-2: bya ba'i me drod yin la me drod de'i stobs
T13D4312-2:38b-4: de ltar na grub pa dang /
T13D4312-2:38b-5: bde ba'i sbyor ba gcig gis de gnyis lus gnas bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:38b-6: rgyu de bas na khong ba'i me drod nyams shing
T13D4312-2:38b-7: bri bar gyur na 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de
T13D4312-2:38b-8: nad 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:38b-9: zas gang lus kyi lus zungs mdangs //
T13D4312-2:38b-10: stobs dang kha dog sogs rgyas byed //
T13D4312-2:38b-11: der rgyu kha zas me drod ni //
T13D4312-2:38b-14: gang zas 'di zos shing bsten pas lus dang lus
T13D4312-2:38b-15: zungs la sogs pa rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa
T13D4312-2:38b-16: de'i rgyu ni me drod kho na yin te /
T13D4312-2:38b-17: gang gi phyir kha zas ma zhu ba las ni
T13D4312-2:38b-18: dangs ma dang khrag la sogs par mi 'gyur te
T13D4312-2:38b-19: / de bas na lus dang lus zungs la sogs
T13D4312-2:38b-20: pa rgyas par byed pa la ni thams cad du
T13D4312-2:38b-21: me'i drod kyis 'ju ba'i bya ba rdzogs par bya
T13D4312-2:38b-22: ba'i phyir me drod kho na rgyu'i gtso bo yin
T13D4312-2:38b-23: / no // zas ni dus su zos gyur pa //
T13D4312-2:38b-24: lto bar srog gi rlung gis drangs //
T13D4312-2:38b-25: skom gyis gong bor rnam par dbye //
T13D4312-2:38b-26: snum gyis mnyen par byas pa yin //
T13D4312-2:38b-27: me mnyam gnas kyis bus nas ni //
T13D4312-2:38b-28: ma zhu'i gnas nas rnam smin byed //
T13D4312-2:38b-29: phyi yi snod gnas 'bras chu ltar //
T13D4312-2:38b-30: lto ba'i me yis zhu bar byed //
T13D4312-2:38b-32: zas su za ba'i kha zas dus su bsten //
T13D4312-2:38b-33: bshang ba dang ni gci ba bsal //
T13D4312-2:38b-34: dag zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa'i tshul du longs spyod par 'gyur na /
T13D4312-2:38b-35: lto'i gnas su srog ces bya ba'i rlung gis drangs
T13D4312-2:38b-36: shing bcug nas skom gyi rnam pa gsher ba'i rdzas
T13D4312-2:38b-37: chu dang 'o ma dang chang la sogs pa gong
T13D4312-2:38b-38: por gnas pa che zhing bshig par 'gyur ba dang
T13D4312-2:38b-39: / snum gyi rdzas mar la sogs pas mnyen zhing 'jam pa nyid du byas pa yin pa la /
T13D4312-2:38b-40: de bzhin du ma zhu ba'i gnas na 'dug pa na smin cing 'jug par byed pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:38b-41: de yang me dang mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya
T13D4312-2:38b-42: ba'i rlung gis de mnyam par spar zhing bus nas
T13D4312-2:38b-43: smin cing 'ju bar byed ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:38b-44: de yang ji ltar phyi'i mes snod kyi nang na
T13D4312-2:38b-45: gnas pa'i sa dang chu 'tshod cing smin par byed
T13D4312-2:38b-46: ba dang 'dra bar lto ba'i mes kyang smin cing
T13D4312-2:38b-47: zhu bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:38b-48: dang bor ro drug zas kyang ni //
T13D4312-2:39a-2: lbu ba can gyur bad kan 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:39a-4: kha zas ro drug po de dag kyang dang po'i gnas skabs la bab pa'i tshe /
T13D4312-2:39a-5: lto ba'i me drod kyis 'ju bar byed pas na /
T13D4312-2:39a-6: kha zas ro drug car zos su zin kyang ro
T13D4312-2:39a-7: mngar ba nyid du gyur cing mngar ba'i rang bzhin
T13D4312-2:39a-8: gyis bad kan gyi nad bslangs shing de'i mtshan nyid
T13D4312-2:39a-10: lbu ba can lbu ba 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:39a-11: zhu ba'i gnas nas 'pho ba na //
T13D4312-2:39a-12: rnam par tsha bas skyur nyid 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:39a-15: dang po'i gnas skabs 'das nas gnas skabs bar ma la bab pa'i tshe /
T13D4312-2:39a-16: lto ba me'i drod kyis smin par byed cing 'ju bar byed pas na /
T13D4312-2:39a-17: rnam par tsha bas skyur ba nyid du gyur pas mkhris par 'gyur te /
T13D4312-2:39a-19: zas de zhu ba'i gnas nas 'pho ba na mkhris pa bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-2:39a-21: me drod kyis skams zhu ba dang //
T13D4312-2:39a-22: kha zhing gong bur gyur rlung skyed ;
T13D4312-2:39a-24: zas de ma zhu ba'i gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas
T13D4312-2:39a-25: su 'phos shing zhu ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang
T13D4312-2:39a-26: / khong pa'i me drod kyis skams pa dang /
T13D4312-2:39a-27: ro kha ba dang gong bur bsdus par gyur pa na /
T13D4312-2:39a-28: gnas skabs gsum par sra bar gyur pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:39a-29: de'i tshe na rlung skyed par 'gyur ba yin no ;
T13D4312-2:39a-30: / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T13D4312-2:39a-31: nam mkhar bcas pa'i drod lnga pos //
T13D4312-2:39a-32: rang rang yon tan zas lnga po //
T13D4312-2:39a-33: sa sogs kyis smin de 'og tu //
T13D4312-2:39a-34: de dag rang rang ji bzhin rgyas //
T13D4312-2:39a-35: smin 'byung yon tan tha dad yin //
T13D4312-2:39a-36: sa ru gtogs pas sa nyid dang //
T13D4312-2:39a-37: lhag mas lus gtogs lhag ma rgyas //
T13D4312-2:39a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i me drod rlung dang
T13D4312-2:39a-39: bcas par gnas pa'i drod lnga po dag gis zas
T13D4312-2:39a-40: kyi yon tan lnga po lci ba la sogs ba
T13D4312-2:39a-41: rang rang gi yon tan la sogs pa rjes su
T13D4312-2:39a-42: mched cing smin par byed la /
T13D4312-2:39a-43: de'i 'og tu sa la sogs pa de dag rang
T13D4312-2:39a-44: rang gi yon tan gang yin pa lus la ji
T13D4312-2:39a-45: ltar gnas pa bzhin du gnas shing 'phel bar byed
T13D4312-2:39a-46: do // de yang so so nas tha dad pa byed pa yin /
T13D4312-2:39a-47: de yang sa ru gtogs pa'i 'byung ba chen pos
T13D4312-2:39a-48: lus la gtogs pa'i sa'i yon tan rgyas shing 'phel
T13D4312-2:39a-50: lhag ma sa'i yon tan las gzhan pa me dang
T13D4312-2:39a-51: chu dang rlung dang nam mkha' rnams kyis kyang sa'i
T13D4312-2:39b-0: yon @39b tan las ma gtogs pa lhag ma rang
T13D4312-2:39b-1: rang gi yon tan rnams lus la gnas pa rgyas
T13D4312-2:39b-2: shing 'phel bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:39b-3: zas de zhu ba'i tshigs ma dang //
T13D4312-2:39b-4: dangs ma zhes bya gnyis su 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:39b-6: zas de zhu ba'i tshe rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
T13D4312-2:39b-9: de las zas kyi tshigs ma sla //
T13D4312-2:39b-12: de la tshigs ma dang dangs ma de nyid las
T13D4312-2:39b-13: zas kyi tshigs ma'i dangs mar gyur pa de ni
T13D4312-2:39b-14: gcin yin par shes par bya la /
T13D4312-2:39b-15: tshigs ma'i skabs gong bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bshang ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:39b-16: dangs ma lus zungs rang rang gi //
T13D4312-2:39b-17: me drod kyis smin rnam bdun 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:39b-19: zas kyi dangs ma bcud du gyur pa'i dangs pa'i
T13D4312-2:39b-20: bdag nyid can gang yin pa de lus zungs rang
T13D4312-2:39b-21: gi me drod kyis yang smin cing tshos par byas
T13D4312-2:39b-22: ba na rnam pa bdun du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:39b-23: dangs ma las khrag de las sha / sha las tshil te de las rus //
T13D4312-2:39b-24: rus rkang de las khu ba yin //
T13D4312-2:39b-25: khu ba las ni mngal gnas 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:39b-27: lus zungs kyi dang po dangs ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:39b-28: khrag de las ni sha ru 'gyur la /
T13D4312-2:39b-29: sha las ni tshil du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:39b-31: / rus pa las ni rkang du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:39b-32: rkang las ni khu chur 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:39b-33: khu chu las ni mngal du gnas shing bu chags pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:39b-34: lus zungs tshigs ma rim bzhin du //
T13D4312-2:39b-35: bad mkhris bu ga'i dri ma dang //
T13D4312-2:39b-36: rdul dang sen mo ba spu dang //
T13D4312-2:39b-37: mig lpags bshang snum dangs ma yin //
T13D4312-2:39b-39: de las lus zungs kyi nang na dangs ma'i tshigs ma ni bad kan no //
T13D4312-2:39b-40: khrag gi tshigs ma ni mkhris pa'o //
T13D4312-2:39b-41: sha'i tshigs ma ni bu ga ste /
T13D4312-2:39b-42: rna ba dang mig dang sna dang kha dang ba spu'i bu ga dang /
T13D4312-2:39b-43: bshang sgo dang mtshan gyi nang nas gang dag 'byung ba rnams so //
T13D4312-2:39b-44: tshil gyi tshigs ma ni gang lus kyi nang nas rdul 'byung ba'o //
T13D4312-2:39b-45: rus pa'i tshigs ma ni sen mo dang ba spu'o //
T13D4312-2:39b-46: rkang gi tshigs ma ni mig dang pags pa dang bshang ba'i yul snum pa'o //
T13D4312-2:39b-47: khu chu'i tshigs ma ni lus zungs thams cad kyi mdangs su gyur pa'o //
T13D4312-2:39b-48: de ltar na rim pa bzhin du sbyar ba yin te /
T13D4312-2:40a-1: zhes bya ba ni dri ma la bya ba'i don no //
T13D4312-2:40a-2: de ltar lus zungs smin pa las //
T13D4312-2:40a-3: dangs ma tshigs ma gnyis su 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:40a-5: ji skad du bshad pa'i dangs ma sogs pa'i lus
T13D4312-2:40a-6: zungs rnams ni me drod kyis smin par byas pa
T13D4312-2:40a-7: las / dangs ma dang snyigs ma ste /
T13D4312-2:40a-8: gnyis su 'gyur zhing rnam pa gnyis kho nar gnas pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:40a-9: lus zungs snum ni gcig la gcig / phan tshun nye bar brten pa yin //
T13D4312-2:40a-11: lus zungs rnams kyi snum ni dangs ma'i snying po ste /
T13D4312-2:40a-12: lus zungs kyi snying po de gcig las gcig tu
T13D4312-2:40a-13: brgyud cing zas kyi ro bcud kyis tshim zhing brten
T13D4312-2:40a-14: par byas pa las rgyun mi 'chad cing 'brel te
T13D4312-2:40a-15: gnas pa gang yin pa de ni phan tshun nye
T13D4312-2:40a-16: bar brten pa las skyes pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:40a-17: lus zungs 'di dag phan tshun gcig la gcig brten
T13D4312-2:40a-18: cing 'dab 'byor pa de las lus zungs kyi snum
T13D4312-2:40a-19: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T13D4312-2:40a-20: // zas 'ju dangs ma sogs rim gyis //
T13D4312-2:40a-21: khu chur gyur pa la la ni //
T13D4312-2:40a-22: nyin zhag gcig 'dod gzhan dag ni //
T13D4312-2:40a-23: zhag drug kha cig zla gcig 'dod //
T13D4312-2:40a-25: zas dang po zhu nas dangs ma la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-2:40a-26: dngos po yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khu
T13D4312-2:40a-27: chu nyid du gyur pa ni /
T13D4312-2:40a-28: sman pa la la nyin zhag gcig gis 'gyur bar 'dod la /
T13D4312-2:40a-29: sman pa gzhan dag ni zhag drug gis khu chu dag tu 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:40a-31: yang srog 'tsho ba'i slob dpon kha cig zas zhu
T13D4312-2:40a-32: nas dangs ma la sogs pa rim gyis zla ba
T13D4312-2:40a-33: gcig gis khu chur 'gyur bar 'dod do //
T13D4312-2:40a-34: lus kyi zungs ni zas kyi rgyun //
T13D4312-2:40a-37: lus zungs rnams kyi zas yin pas na lus zungs kyi zas te /
T13D4312-2:40a-38: lus zungs rnams ni lus zungs kyi zas yin no //
T13D4312-2:40a-40: de ltar na lus zungs rnams kyi rten du ni lus zungs rnams gnas pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:40a-41: de rnams kyi rgyu ba'i rgyun ni 'khor lo'i tshul
T13D4312-2:40a-42: ltar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba yin zhing zas
T13D4312-2:40a-43: la brten pas brtas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-2:40a-44: ro tsa la sogs mthu yis ni //
T13D4312-2:40a-45: 'phral du khu ba la sogs skyed //
T13D4312-2:40a-47: 'o ma dang sha khu la sogs ba ro tsa
T13D4312-2:40b-0: bar byed pa'i kha zas @40b dang de bzhin du
T13D4312-2:40b-1: sogs zhes smos pas dug dang sbyar dug rab tu
T13D4312-2:40b-2: zhi ba la sogs pas 'phral du ste /
T13D4312-2:40b-3: de'i mod la de'i khu ba la sogs pa skyed do //
T13D4312-2:40b-4: phal cher sman gzhan nyin zhag ni //
T13D4312-2:40b-5: gcig gis las rnams byed pa yin //
T13D4312-2:40b-7: phal cher zhes bya ba ro tsa ba la sogs
T13D4312-2:40b-8: pa ma gtogs pa'i sman gzhan phye ma dang bu
T13D4312-2:40b-10: smin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa dag ni /
T13D4312-2:40b-11: phal cher nyin zhag gcig ni rang gi las byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:40b-12: khyab byed kyis dangs lus zungs rnams //
T13D4312-2:40b-13: 'thor bar byed pa'i las kyis ni //
T13D4312-2:40b-14: cig car rgyun mi 'chad kun tu //
T13D4312-2:40b-15: lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor //
T13D4312-2:40b-17: rlung khyab byed kyis dangs ma dang /
T13D4312-2:40b-18: lus zungs rnams la 'thor zhing khyab par byed pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:40b-19: 'thor zhing khyab par byed pa'i las de dang 'tsham
T13D4312-2:40b-20: pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa gang yin pa des
T13D4312-2:40b-21: cig car rgyun mi 'chad cing bar chad med par
T13D4312-2:40b-22: lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor zhing khyab par
T13D4312-2:40b-24: gtor tshe bu ga'i skyon gyis ni //
T13D4312-2:40b-25: dangs ma gong du chags gyur te //
T13D4312-2:40b-26: der ni gnod pa skyed byed de //
T13D4312-2:40b-27: mkha' la sprin chags char 'bab mtshungs //
T13D4312-2:40b-29: dangs ma'i zas rab tu sgrub bor byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
T13D4312-2:40b-30: khyab byed kyis gtor ba'i tshe bu ga nad kyis
T13D4312-2:40b-31: 'khrugs pa'i skyon gyis dangs ma'i phyogs gang du chags
T13D4312-2:40b-32: shing gnas par gyur pa'i lus kyi phyogs der gnod
T13D4312-2:40b-33: pa byed cing nad skyed par byed do //
T13D4312-2:40b-34: de yang ji ltar nam mkha'i bar snang la sprin chags par gyur na /
T13D4312-2:40b-35: de las char bab par 'gyur ba dang mtshungs so //
T13D4312-2:40b-36: nad kyang ma snyoms gyur pa las //
T13D4312-2:40b-39: rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyang tshul de bzhin
T13D4312-2:40b-40: du ma snyoms par gyur pa las phyogs gcig tu
T13D4312-2:40b-41: 'dus na gnas kyi skyon gyis nad skyed par 'gyur
T13D4312-2:40b-42: ro // de ltar 'byung ba lus zungs me'i //
T13D4312-2:40b-43: las ni yongs su bshad pa yin ;
T13D4312-2:40b-45: de ltar bshad pa'i rim pas me'i las bshad cing bstan pa yin /
T13D4312-2:40b-46: de yang zas 'ju zhing smin pa'i las dang de
T13D4312-2:40b-47: bzhin du 'byung ba chen po lnga dang de bzhin
T13D4312-2:40b-48: du lus zungs kyi me bshad pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:40b-50: zas ni dus su zos gyur ba //
T13D4312-2:41a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pas @41a * //
T13D4312-2:41a-1: lto ba'i me'i las bshad pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:41a-2: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T13D4312-2:41a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T13D4312-2:41a-4: 'byung ba lnga'i las bshad pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:41a-5: dangs ma lus zungs rang rang gis //
T13D4312-2:41a-7: lus zungs kyi me'i las bshad pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:41a-8: smin byed kun la zas 'ju ba'i //
T13D4312-2:41a-9: me ni lhag pa yin par 'dod //
T13D4312-2:41a-11: smin par byed pa me'i drod thams cad kyi nang
T13D4312-2:41a-12: nas zas 'ju bar byed pa'i pho ba'i me drod
T13D4312-2:41a-13: gang yin pa de ni lhag cing mchog tu gyur
T13D4312-2:41a-16: zad gyur zad pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:41a-18: gang gi phyir zas 'ju ba'i me drod de ni rtsa ba yin te /
T13D4312-2:41a-20: me drod gzhan dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur la /
T13D4312-2:41a-21: zas kyi me drod de zad par gyur na 'byung
T13D4312-2:41a-22: ba lnga dang lus zungs kyi me drod kyang zas
T13D4312-2:41a-23: kyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:41a-24: de bas rigs pas cho ga bzhin //
T13D4312-2:41a-25: zas skom rigs shing phan pa yin //
T13D4312-2:41a-26: de 'bad pas bsrung gnas gyur na //
T13D4312-2:41a-27: tshe dang stobs ni gnas par 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:41a-29: de ltar rtsa ba yin pa'i rgyu yin pa de bas na /
T13D4312-2:41a-30: zas 'ju bar byed pa'i me drod de rigs shing
T13D4312-2:41a-31: phan pa'i cho ga bzhin du zas dang skom gyi
T13D4312-2:41a-32: bud shing rjes su mthun par bsrung zhing bskyang ba
T13D4312-2:41a-33: la 'bad pa dang ldan bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:41a-35: zas 'ju ba'i pho ba'i me gnas par gyur na tshe gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-2:41a-36: lus kyi stobs gnas par 'gyur ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:41a-37: mnyam gnas rang gnas 'dug na mnyam //
T13D4312-2:41a-38: mnyam las gzhan 'gro drod mi snyoms //
T13D4312-2:41a-39: mkhris pa shas cher rno bar 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:41a-40: bad kan gyis gnod me drod chung //
T13D4312-2:41a-42: me dang mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung rang gi gnas su 'dug la /
T13D4312-2:41a-43: me'i drod kyang mnyam zhing snyoms par 'gyur la /
T13D4312-2:41a-44: lam gzhan du 'gro zhing rang gi gnas na 'dug
T13D4312-2:41a-45: na me'i drod mi snyoms shing cha mi snyoms par
T13D4312-2:41a-46: 'gyur ro ; / me dang mnyam du gnas pa
T13D4312-2:41a-47: de bad kan gyi shas kyis mnan cing gnod par
T13D4312-2:41a-48: 'gyur ro ; gyur na / me drod chung bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:41a-49: me drod mnyam dang mi mnyam rno //
T13D4312-2:41a-50: chung dang de ltar rnam bzhi yin //
T13D4312-2:41a-52: me'i drod kyi stobs kyi dbye ba ni cha mnyam pa dang /
T13D4312-2:41b-0: rno ba dang chung @41b ba ste rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:41b-1: gang zhig zas ni legs zos pa //
T13D4312-2:41b-4: da la me shas mnyam pa ni zas kyi tshod la sogs pa legs par brtags te /
T13D4312-2:41b-5: zos ba de legs par 'ju bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:41b-6: legs par ma zos myur 'ju ba'am //
T13D4312-2:41b-7: legs zos ring zhing 'ju mi mnyam //
T13D4312-2:41b-9: me drod mi mnyam zhing mi snyoms pa ni /
T13D4312-2:41b-10: zas kyi cho ga'i tshul bzhin du legs par ma
T13D4312-2:41b-11: zos kyang myur du 'ju ba'am legs par zos su
T13D4312-2:41b-12: zin kyang ring zhig na 'ju bar gyur pa yin
T13D4312-2:41b-13: no // zas ni legs par ma zos kyang //
T13D4312-2:41b-14: myur 'ju me drod rnon po yin //
T13D4312-2:41b-16: me'i drod rnon po'i mtshan nyid ni /
T13D4312-2:41b-17: tshad la sogs pa dang ldan par legs par ma
T13D4312-2:41b-18: zos su zin kyang myur du 'ju bar byed pa
T13D4312-2:41b-19: yin te / de nyid 'phel bar gyur na /
T13D4312-2:41b-20: me drod drags ches par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:41b-21: zas ni legs par zos gyur kyang //
T13D4312-2:41b-22: ring nas 'ju zhing kha skam dang //
T13D4312-2:41b-23: sbo dang rgyu ma 'khrugs pa dang //
T13D4312-2:41b-24: lci ba me drod chung ba yin //
T13D4312-2:41b-26: me drod chung ba ni zas kyi cho ga legs
T13D4312-2:41b-27: par zos su zin kyang kha sgam pa la sogs
T13D4312-2:41b-28: par byed nas ring zhig na gdod 'ju bar byed
T13D4312-2:41b-29: pa yin no // rgyu ma 'khrugs pa ni sgra mi gsal bar krug krug zer ba'o //
T13D4312-2:41b-30: lci ba ni lus kyi khong lci zhing snyom pa'o //
T13D4312-2:41b-32: skyon med na ni yun ring 'tsho //
T13D4312-2:41b-33: ma snyoms nad ni skye 'gyur bas //
T13D4312-2:41b-34: de'i phyir me drod gtso bo yin //
T13D4312-2:41b-36: gong du smos pa'i me drod nyams shing med par gyur na ni /
T13D4312-2:41b-38: skyon med cing nad kyi nyes pa dang ma 'dres
T13D4312-2:41b-39: na yun ring du 'tsho zhing tshe gnas par 'gyur
T13D4312-2:41b-40: ro // me'i drod che chung ma snyoms par gyur na ni nad rnams skyed par 'gyur la /
T13D4312-2:41b-41: de bas na me'i drod ni lus gnas pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:41b-43: lus stobs lhan cig skyes pa dang //
T13D4312-2:41b-44: dus skyes rigs pa las byug gsum //
T13D4312-2:41b-46: lus kyi stobs kyi tshul ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T13D4312-2:41b-48: dus kyi dbang gis skyes pa dang /
T13D4312-2:41b-49: rigs pa'i sbyor ba las skyes pa'o //
T13D4312-2:41b-50: de la lus sems las byung ba //
T13D4312-2:41b-51: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i stobs //
T13D4312-2:42a-1: nang nas lus dang sems las byung ba'i stobs rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'am /
T13D4312-2:42a-2: tha mal par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni lhan cig skyas pa'i stobs zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-2:42a-3: na tshod dus tshigs las byung ba //
T13D4312-2:42a-6: na tshod byis pa dang dar la bab pa la
T13D4312-2:42a-7: sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i dbang las byung zhing
T13D4312-2:42a-8: na tshod ji lta ba'i tshul ma skyes pa dang
T13D4312-2:42a-9: / dgun la sogs pa'i dus las byung zhing skyed pa'i dus las bskyed pa ste /
T13D4312-2:42a-10: de gnyis ni dus las skyes pa'i stobs zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-2:42a-12: byung ba spyod lam zas gyis bskyed ;
T13D4312-2:42a-13: / de bzhin gzi bskyed sbyor las byung //
T13D4312-2:42a-15: de la rigs pa las byung ba'i stobs spyod lam
T13D4312-2:42a-16: zhes pa lus dang ngag dang yid kyis byas pa'i
T13D4312-2:42a-17: spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T13D4312-2:42a-18: de bzhin du zas kyi rnam pa bza' ba dang /
T13D4312-2:42a-21: myang ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma ste /
T13D4312-2:42a-22: de gnyis las byung ba ni rigs pa las byung ba zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-2:42a-23: de yang rigs pa ni 'di dang 'di ltar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:42a-24: zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul nges pa ste /
T13D4312-2:42a-26: de bzhin du gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba las
T13D4312-2:42a-27: byung ba de yang rigs pa las byung ba yin
T13D4312-2:42a-28: te / gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba ni phal cher bcud kyis len pa dang /
T13D4312-2:42a-29: ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba yin pas /
T13D4312-2:42a-30: de gnyis las skyes pas na gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-2:42a-31: yul phyogs shing ri chu nyung la //
T13D4312-2:42a-32: skams nad nyung skyed byed yin //
T13D4312-2:42a-33: rlan can de las bzlog pa yin //
T13D4312-2:42a-34: cha mnyam thun mong yin par bshad //
T13D4312-2:42a-36: skam sa'i yul phyogs shing dang ri dang chu nyung
T13D4312-2:42a-37: zhing shas chung ba gang yin pa de ni nad
T13D4312-2:42a-38: nyung ba skyed cing nad med pa'i rgyu yin la
T13D4312-2:42a-39: / yul sa rlan can dag ni skams las go bzlog pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:42a-40: shing dang ri dang chu mang ba de nad skyed pa yin no ;
T13D4312-2:42a-41: / de gnyi ga'i cha mnyam pa ni thun mong yin te /
T13D4312-2:42a-42: gnyi ga'i cha yod pa'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-2:42a-43: rkang dang tshil dang zhag dang gcin //
T13D4312-2:42a-44: mkhris pa bad kan phyi sa khrag / dangs ma chu rnams lus gnas pa'i //
T13D4312-2:42a-45: snyim pa re res bskyed par bya //
T13D4312-2:42b-0: lus dang rkang nas chu'i bar dag gang @42b yod
T13D4312-2:42b-1: pa ni snyim pa re res bskyed par bya ste
T13D4312-2:42b-3: rkang ni snyim pa gcig go //
T13D4312-2:42b-4: tshil ni snyim pa gnyis so //
T13D4312-2:42b-5: zhag ni snyim pa gsum mo //
T13D4312-2:42b-7: mkhris pa ni snyim pa lnga'o //
T13D4312-2:42b-13: mdangs dang klad rgyas khu chu ni //
T13D4312-2:42b-14: re re 'ang rang gi khyor gang yin //
T13D4312-2:42b-16: dangs ma la sogs pa gsum po ni re re
T13D4312-2:42b-17: zhing yang rang gi khyor tshad kyi khyor re re
T13D4312-2:42b-18: yod par slob dpon dag gis bshad do //
T13D4312-2:42b-19: bud med nu zho snyim do dang //
T13D4312-2:42b-20: zla mtshan snyim pa bzhi yod do //
T13D4312-2:42b-22: bud med rnams la nu zho ni rang gi tshad kyi snyim do yod la /
T13D4312-2:42b-23: zla mtshan gyi khrag ni snyim pa bzhi yod pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:42b-24: 'di ltar snyim pa dang khyor ba zhes smos pa ni /
T13D4312-2:42b-25: rang rang gi lag pa'i tshad kyi che chung la bya'i /
T13D4312-2:42b-26: srang tshad kyi yi ge las smos pa ltar srang bzhi dang srang gnyis la mi bya ste /
T13D4312-2:42b-27: 'dir rang gi zhes smos pa'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-2:42b-28: de la snyim pa ni lag pa gnyis sbyar ba las byung ba'o //
T13D4312-2:42b-29: khyor ba ni lag pa gcig skyor te bzhag pa'o //
T13D4312-2:42b-30: lus zungs mnyam nas tshad 'di yin //
T13D4312-2:42b-31: de las 'phel dang zad ces bya //
T13D4312-2:42b-33: gong du bshad pa'i tshul 'di ni /
T13D4312-2:42b-34: skyes bu lus zungs cha mnyam par gnas pa las tshad du bya ba yin pas /
T13D4312-2:42b-35: tshad de la 'phel ba dang zad par gyur par shes shing rtogs par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:42b-36: khu chu khrag dang sbrum ma'i zas //
T13D4312-2:42b-37: spyod lam mngal gnas dus tshigs nas //
T13D4312-2:42b-38: gang zhig nyes pa lhag gyur des //
T13D4312-2:42b-39: rang bzhin rnam pa bdun du bshad ;
T13D4312-2:42b-44: spyod lam mngal gyi gnas dang /
T13D4312-2:42b-45: dus tshigs de rnams las gang zhig nad kyis nyen
T13D4312-2:42b-46: pa'i dbang gis tshad las lhag par gyur pa des
T13D4312-2:42b-47: / khu chu la sogs par gnas pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa bdun bshad de /
T13D4312-2:42b-50: bad kan gyi rang bzhin dang /
T13D4312-2:42b-51: rlung dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T13D4312-2:42b-52: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rang bzhin te de ltar bdun no //
T13D4312-2:42b-53: khyab dang myur bar byed phyir dang //
T13D4312-2:42b-54: stobs ldan pa dang gzhan ldang byed //
T13D4312-2:42b-55: rang dbang can dang nad mang phyir //
T13D4312-2:43a-1: las phal cher rlung stobs can //
T13D4312-2:43a-3: rlung nad kyi rang bzhin ni khyab cing kun tu 'gro ba dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-4: myur zhing rengs bar nad skyed pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-5: stobs dang ldan zhing mthu che ba dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-6: mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad ldang bar byed pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-7: bshang gci la sogs pa 'dren par byed pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-8: rang dbang can rang rgyud du gnas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-9: de bzhin du nad mang ba ste /
T13D4312-2:43a-10: rlung nad brgyad cu skyed pa'i phyir nad gzhi gsum
T13D4312-2:43a-11: cha las kyang rlung nad ni phal cher zhes smos
T13D4312-2:43a-12: pa ni khyad par du byas pa'i tshig smos pa
T13D4312-2:43a-13: yin no // de nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i mi rnams ni /
T13D4312-2:43a-14: nad kyi bdag nyid rdul can skra bshor pags pa gas //
T13D4312-2:43a-15: grang lhags mi bzod brtan dran blo gros spyod mdzad sred //
T13D4312-2:43a-16: blta dang 'gro ba g-yo zhing smra ba shin tu mang //
T13D4312-2:43a-18: rgyu de nyid kyis ni rlung gi nad kyis bskyod
T13D4312-2:43a-19: pa'i mi rlung gis khu chu dang khrag la sogs
T13D4312-2:43a-20: pa bskyod par 'gyur ba'i mi rnams ni /
T13D4312-2:43a-21: nad kyi bdag nyid can du gnas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-22: rdul gyis gtor ba lta bur skra dang lus la sogs par gnas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-23: de bzhin du grang lhags mi bzod cing dro bar 'dod pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43a-24: de bzhin du brten pa nas 'gro ba'i bar shin tu g-yo zhing brten pa ma yin te /
T13D4312-2:43a-25: brtan pa ni sran thub pa'o //
T13D4312-2:43a-26: dran pa ni mi brjed pa'o ;
T13D4312-2:43a-27: / blo gros ni shes rab bo //
T13D4312-2:43a-29: mdza' la sred pa ni yid gcugs par dga' ba'o //
T13D4312-2:43a-31: 'gro ba ni kun tu 'phyan pa ste /
T13D4312-2:43a-32: de dag g-yo zhing mi brtan pa'o //
T13D4312-2:43a-33: de bzhin du shin tu mang du smra zhing smra ba la dga' ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:43a-34: bad kan nor nyung tshe thung gnyid srab dang //
T13D4312-2:43a-35: gcom chung tshig thogs g-yo zhing skad 'dzer dang //
T13D4312-2:43a-36: chad lta mang du za zhing sgeg dang bcas //
T13D4312-2:43a-37: glu dang dgod dang rngon las 'thab la dga' //
T13D4312-2:43a-39: gzhan yang rlung can gyi mi'i mtshan nyid ni bad
T13D4312-2:43a-40: kan dang nor nyung ba la sogs pa yin te
T13D4312-2:43a-41: / gcom chung ba ni tshig phra ba'o //
T13D4312-2:43a-42: tshig thogs pa ni phyed lus pa'o //
T13D4312-2:43a-43: g-yo ba ni mi brtan pa'o //
T13D4312-2:43a-44: skad 'dzer ba ni skad gsang nyams pa'o //
T13D4312-2:43a-45: chad par lta ba ni med par lta ba'i gzhung la dga' ba'o //
T13D4312-2:43a-46: mang du za ba ni lto che ba'o //
T13D4312-2:43b-0: sgeg pa dang bcas pa ni bsgyings tshul dang bcas pa @43b dang glu dang dgod pa'o //
T13D4312-2:43b-1: rngon pa'i las ri dags shor ba dang 'thab pa la dga' ba rnams dang ldan pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:43b-2: mngar skyur kha dang tsha ba'i ro goms sred //
T13D4312-2:43b-3: lus skem dbyibs reng 'gro tshe sgra dang bcas //
T13D4312-2:43b-4: mi brtan dbang po mi thul dam pa min //
T13D4312-2:43b-5: bud med mi chags bu mang skye mi 'gyur ;
T13D4312-2:43b-7: rlung gi rang bzhin can gyi bu gang yin pa
T13D4312-2:43b-8: de ni ro mngar ba la sogs pa'i goms par
T13D4312-2:43b-9: sred pa dang / lus skem zhing dbyibs ring ba dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-10: 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i tshe tshigs sgra 'khrol ba dang bcas pa ste /
T13D4312-2:43b-11: 'gro zhing 'chags mi brtan zhing g-yo ba dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-12: dbang po mi thul zhing zhi ba'i spyod pa med pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-13: dam pa'i spyod pa med cing 'phags pa ma yin pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-14: bud med rnams la mngon par mi dga' zhing rjes su chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-15: bu tsha mang po skye zhing 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:43b-16: de yi mig ni rtsub cing rdul gyis gang //
T13D4312-2:43b-17: zlum zhing mi mdzes 'chi ba lta bu dang //
T13D4312-2:43b-18: phye gdangs gnyid log lta bur snang ba yin //
T13D4312-2:43b-19: de ni shing dang ri 'dzeg mkha' 'phur rmi //
T13D4312-2:43b-21: rlung gi rang bzhin gyi skyes bu mig rtsub cing snum pa med pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-22: rdul gyis gang zhing phyag dar gtor ba ltar snang ba la /
T13D4312-2:43b-23: mig gi dbyibs zlum pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-24: mi mdzes shing blta na mi sdug pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-25: 'chi ba'i mig dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-26: phye zhing gdangs par gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-27: gnyid kyis log pa 'dra bar snang ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:43b-28: de bzhin du rmi lam gyi nang du shing chen po la 'dzeg pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-30: nam mkha' la 'phur ba rmi ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:43b-31: skal ngan ser sna che zhing khengs pa dang //
T13D4312-2:43b-32: rku zhing byin snying rtsa rings bcas pa dang //
T13D4312-2:43b-33: khyi dang wa dang bya rgod rnga mo khrag / byi ba'i mtshan nyid ldan mi rlung can yin //
T13D4312-2:43b-35: rlung gi mtshan nyid can gyi mi ni skal ba ngan cing bkra mi shis pa dang /
T13D4312-2:43b-39: rku 'phrog la dga' ba dang byin snying gi rgyab kyi rtsa mtho zhing rtse mo 'khyil zhing /
T13D4312-2:43b-40: byin pa'i nyva glo zhing mtho ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:43b-46: byi ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing de dag gi
T13D4312-2:44a-0: rang bzhin can gyi gzugs dang ro dang spyod @44a
T13D4312-2:44a-1: * // pa rjes su mthun pa gang dag yin pa dang ldan te /
T13D4312-2:44a-2: de lta bu'i mi ni rlung gi rang bzhin can yin par shes par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-3: mkhris pa me 'dra me las byung yin phyir //
T13D4312-2:44a-4: mkhris pa rgyas pa skom dang bkres shas che //
T13D4312-2:44a-5: mdog ser lus tsha rkang lag gdong yang dmar //
T13D4312-2:44a-6: skra ser spu nyung dpa' zhing nga rgyal che //
T13D4312-2:44a-8: drang srong thang la 'bar gyi gzhung gis mkhris pa rang nyid me dang 'dra ste /
T13D4312-2:44a-9: smin pa la sogs pa'i las byed pas ma'i sgrar bshad do //
T13D4312-2:44a-10: me'i rang bzhin can gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'am /
T13D4312-2:44a-11: me drod kyi gzhi yin par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-2:44a-12: de las byung ba ni tshigs ma'i rang bzhin can gyi khrag ni mkhris pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:44a-13: de'i phyir mkhris pa de rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur
T13D4312-2:44a-14: ba'i srog chags rnams ni skom pa dang bkres pa'i
T13D4312-2:44a-15: shas che ba dang lus kyang mdog ser ba dang
T13D4312-2:44a-16: / lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gnas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:44a-17: rkang pa dang lag pa dang gdong gi kha dog dmar ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44a-18: skra dmar ser du gnas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:44a-19: spu'i tshogs 'byi zhing nyung ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44a-20: dpa' zhing rtul phod pa dang /
T13D4312-2:44a-21: nga rgyal che zhing khengs pa dang bcas pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:44a-22: phreng ba byug pa rgyan la lhag par dga' //
T13D4312-2:44a-23: spyod bzang gtsang sbra che zhing mnyes gshin la //
T13D4312-2:44a-24: 'byor dang rtul phod blo gros stobs dang ldan //
T13D4312-2:44a-25: 'jig rten dgra bo 'ang skyabs 'ongs skyob par byed //
T13D4312-2:44a-27: mkhris ba can gyi mi ni /
T13D4312-2:44a-28: phreng ba la sogs pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te /
T13D4312-2:44a-29: phreng ba ni me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-30: byug ba ni dri zhim pos bskus pa'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-31: rgyan ni mu tig gi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan cing bzhag pa'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-32: spyod pa bzang po ni byed spyod mdzes pa'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-33: gtsang sbra che ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid skyon med pa'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-34: mnyes gshin pa ni bran g-yog la sogs pa la byams pa'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-35: 'byor pa ni longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-36: rtul phod pa ni nyams kyis mi lcogs ba dag kyang byed par spro ba'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-37: blo gros kyi stobs ni shes rab kyi nus pa ste /
T13D4312-2:44a-38: de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //
T13D4312-2:44a-39: de bzhin du 'jigs shing skrag pas nyen pa'i dgra
T13D4312-2:44a-40: bo dag kyang skyabs su 'ongs shing 'dud par byed
T13D4312-2:44a-41: pas na / skyob cing gnod pa las srung bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:44b-0: yid @44b gzhungs tshigs kyi mtshams dang sha ni rab tu lhod //
T13D4312-2:44b-1: bud med mi dga' khu ba dang ni 'dod pa chung //
T13D4312-2:44b-2: gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig sngo'i gnas gyur la //
T13D4312-2:44b-3: zas ni mngar dang bska dang kha bsil za bar dga' //
T13D4312-2:44b-5: yang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi ni yid gzhungs shing blo dang ldan pa dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-6: rus pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel mtshams sha'i tshigs lhod cing grims bag med pa dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-7: bud med rnams de la dga' bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-8: khu ba'i shas chung ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-9: 'dod pa chung zhing 'khrig pa la mngon par mi gdu ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-10: phags pa'i tshogs gnyer ma mang ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-12: mig sngo ba'i nad rnams su 'gyur zhing de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-13: kha zas kyang mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro dang
T13D4312-2:44b-14: ldan pa la sred cing dga' ba la longs spyod
T13D4312-2:44b-16: than pa mi bzod rdul zhing dri nga la //
T13D4312-2:44b-17: bshang gci bza' btung khro dang phrag dog mang //
T13D4312-2:44b-18: rmi lam dong ka ba la sha'i me tog / glog 'gyu phyogs tshig skar mda' nyi me mthong //
T13D4312-2:44b-20: gzhan yang mkhris pa can gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T13D4312-2:44b-21: tshad pa mi bzod cing bsten mi nus pa dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-23: lus dri nga zhing mnam pa dang ;
T13D4312-2:44b-24: de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa mang zhing shas che ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-25: gnyid log pa'i rmi lam gyi nang na dong ka'i shing dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-26: de bzhin du pa la sha'i me tog dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-27: de bzhin du glog 'gyu ba dang /
T13D4312-2:44b-31: me chen po 'bar ba mthong ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:44b-32: 'di yi lus phra mig ser g-yo ba dang //
T13D4312-2:44b-33: rdzi ma srab cing nyung zhing grang la dga' //

T13D4312-2:50b-45: chu so'i gnad ni sha khrag nyung //
T13D4312-2:50b-46: dbus na kha cig thur du lta //
T13D4312-2:51a-2: de yang ngos gnyis phug ste 'dra //
T13D4312-2:51a-3: gcin 'dzag gnas dang gcig tu phug / rma ni 'tsho bar shin tu dka' //
T13D4312-2:51a-5: lgang ba'i gcin gyi gnas te /
T13D4312-2:51a-6: de na gzhu'i dbyibs ltar yo ba'i gnad chu so zhes bya ba la /
T13D4312-2:51a-7: sha dang khrag nyung zhing shas chung bar gnas pa /
T13D4312-2:51a-8: dbus na kha gcig yod pa kha thur du bltas pa rked pa'i dbus na yod de /
T13D4312-2:51a-9: de phug na srog 'phral du de'i mod la 'jig
T13D4312-2:51a-10: cing 'jig par byed de gcin nad rde'us 'gags pa
T13D4312-2:51a-11: 'byin ba'i rma gang zhig byed pa de ma gtogs
T13D4312-2:51a-12: te / rde'u 'byin pa'i rma'i skabs der yang ngos
T13D4312-2:51a-13: gnyis su phug cing brtol na snga ma dang 'dra
T13D4312-2:51a-15: chu so'i phyogs gcig tu phug na gcin 'dzag pa'i rmar 'gyur te /
T13D4312-2:51a-16: de yang 'tshob cing 'byor pa ni shin tu dka' ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:51a-17: lus ni zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas //
T13D4312-2:51a-18: dbus la lte ba rtsa kun gyi //
T13D4312-2:51a-19: rten yin de yang 'phral gsod byed //
T13D4312-2:51a-21: lus kyi dbus su zhu ba dang ma zhu ba'i
T13D4312-2:51a-22: gnas na lte ba zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gnad
T13D4312-2:51a-23: yod de / de yang rtsa thams cad kyi rten dang gnas yin la /
T13D4312-2:51a-24: de phug par gyur na yang 'phral du gsod cing srog dang 'bral bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:51a-25: ma zhu ba yi gnas sgor gyur //
T13D4312-2:51a-26: 'dod chags sogs gnas snying zhes bya //
T13D4312-2:51a-27: brang dang nu ma lto dbus gnas //
T13D4312-2:51a-29: ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor gyur pa 'dod chags
T13D4312-2:51a-30: zhe sdang gti mug gi gnas su gyur pa snying
T13D4312-2:51a-31: zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13D4312-2:51a-32: de yang brang dang nu ma dang lto ba'i dbus na gnas pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:51a-33: de phug na yang 'phral du 'chi ba yin no //
T13D4312-2:51a-34: nu 'jing nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya //
T13D4312-2:51a-35: steng 'og sor gnyis nu ma'i gnad //
T13D4312-2:51a-36: de phug bad kan khrag gis ni //
T13D4312-2:51a-40: nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis /
T13D4312-2:51a-41: nu ma gnyis kyi gong 'og na yod de /
T13D4312-2:51a-42: nu ma gnyis kyi gong gi sor gnyis dang //
T13D4312-2:51a-43: nu ma gnyis kyi rtsa ba'i sor gnyis kyi zabs na yod la /
T13D4312-2:51a-44: nu 'jing dang nu ma'i rtsa'i gnad de nyid phug
T13D4312-2:51a-45: pa'i mi ni khrag dang bad kan gyis lto 'gengs
T13D4312-2:51a-47: de yang rim bzhin khengs pa /
T13D4312-2:51a-48: nu 'jing gi gnad phug pa ni bad kan dang khrag gis /
T13D4312-2:51b-1: nu ma'i rtsa phug pas ni khrag gis khengs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:51b-2: rengs bral brang gi ngos gnyis na //
T13D4312-2:51b-3: rtsa sbubs gnyis po rlung rgyu ba //
T13D4312-2:51b-4: de phug khog ba khrag gis khengs //
T13D4312-2:51b-5: lud pa dbugs mi bde bas 'chi //
T13D4312-2:51b-7: rengs pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi
T13D4312-2:51b-8: bye brag brang gi ngos gnyis na rtsa sbubs gnyis
T13D4312-2:51b-9: po ni rlung rgyu bar byed pa yod la /
T13D4312-2:51b-10: de phug cing brtol na khong ba khrag gis bkang
T13D4312-2:51b-11: nas lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis
T13D4312-2:51b-13: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs brang gi bar //
T13D4312-2:51b-14: de nyid kyi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13D4312-2:51b-15: phrag pa gnyis kyi 'og na ni //
T13D4312-2:51b-16: mig gsal zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod //
T13D4312-2:51b-17: de nyid phug pas khong pa ni //
T13D4312-2:51b-20: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs dang mdun gyi brang gi bar te /
T13D4312-2:51b-21: nang rgyab dang brang bar de nyid kyi ngos kyi
T13D4312-2:51b-22: nang na phrag ba'i mgo logs mi gsal ba zhes
T13D4312-2:51b-23: bya ba gnad gnyis yod par shes par bya ste
T13D4312-2:51b-24: / de nyid phug na khong pa'i byang khog khrag gis khengs shing /
T13D4312-2:51b-25: khrag de nyid rnag tu gyur nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:51b-26: sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13D4312-2:51b-27: rked pa'i cha gnyis gnas pa dang //
T13D4312-2:51b-28: rkub chos ltag gnas sgal tshigs brten //
T13D4312-2:51b-29: rked pa can dang gzhon nur bshad //
T13D4312-2:51b-30: de snad khrag zad skya rbab dang //
T13D4312-2:51b-33: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs kyi ngos g-yas g-yon gnyis na
T13D4312-2:51b-34: rked pa'i dbyi zur gyi cha gnyis na gnas pa
T13D4312-2:51b-35: dang / rkub tshos kyi ltag na gnas pa'i sgal tshigs rus pa la brten cing gnas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:51b-36: rked pa can na gzhon nu zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis yod do //
T13D4312-2:51b-37: gnad de gnyis snad cing phug na khrag zad pas skya bo bseng bseng por 'gyur zhing /
T13D4312-2:51b-38: gzugs dang gzi mdangs zad pas kha dog mi sdug pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:51b-39: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis kyi //
T13D4312-2:51b-40: rked pa'i mtshams ni gang yin pa //
T13D4312-2:51b-41: ro smad kyi ni rgyab phyogs na //
T13D4312-2:51b-42: khung bu zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod //
T13D4312-2:51b-43: de snad bskyod pa nyams pa dang //
T13D4312-2:51b-44: ro smad tshor ba med par 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:51b-46: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis ni rked ba'i mtshams
T13D4312-2:51b-47: ro smad kyi phyi rol gyi rgyab kyi cha na
T13D4312-2:52a-0: khung bu zhes bya ba'i gnad @52a * //
T13D4312-2:52a-2: de gnyis snad cing nyams pas lus kyi ro smad kyi bskyod cing 'gul ba nyams pa dang /
T13D4312-2:52a-3: ro smad la tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52a-4: gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis dang 'brel //
T13D4312-2:52a-5: sta zur rtse mo gnyis steng gi //
T13D4312-2:52a-6: gnas ni g-yogs bar gyur pa dang //
T13D4312-2:52a-7: ro smad gzhon nu'i rus par gnas //
T13D4312-2:52a-8: de snad ro smad skrangs pa dang //
T13D4312-2:52a-11: gnad gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis kyi gnad dang 'brel
T13D4312-2:52a-12: zhing rtsib logs kyi bar dang 'dab 'byor ba dang
T13D4312-2:52a-13: / sta zur gyi rtse mo gnyis kyi steng gi
T13D4312-2:52a-14: gnas gang yin pa de g-yogs shing bsgribs par gyur
T13D4312-2:52a-15: / pa ni / gnad ro smad ces bya ste /
T13D4312-2:52a-16: de yang gzhon nu zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi rus bar gnas pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:52a-17: gnad de dag phug cing snad pas ni /
T13D4312-2:52a-18: lus kyi ro smad kyi cha skrang pa dang /
T13D4312-2:52a-19: nyam chung zhing stobs zhan pa nyid du gyur nas /
T13D4312-2:52a-20: de'i 'og tu 'chi ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52a-21: rtsib logs gnyis kyi nang dang 'brel //
T13D4312-2:52a-22: rked pa'i ngos gnyis dbus gang gnas //
T13D4312-2:52a-23: thad ka dang ni gyen gnas pa //
T13D4312-2:52a-24: rtsib logs mtshams te de phug na //
T13D4312-2:52a-25: khong pa khrag gis gang ba dang //
T13D4312-2:52a-26: lus dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:52a-28: rtsib logs gnyis kyi nang grol dang 'brel cing 'dab 'byor pa /
T13D4312-2:52a-29: rked pa'i ngos gnyis kyi dbus na thad ka dang
T13D4312-2:52a-30: gyen du gnas pa'i gnad gnyis ni drang srong rnams
T13D4312-2:52a-31: kyis rtsib logs kyi mtshams zhes bshad de /
T13D4312-2:52a-32: de gnyis phug cing snad par gyur na /
T13D4312-2:52a-33: khong pa khrag gis gang nas lus dang bral te 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ro ;
T13D4312-2:52a-34: / nu ma gnyis kyi thad ka'i cha //
T13D4312-2:52a-35: rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten pa //
T13D4312-2:52a-36: rtsa chen zhes bya de phug na //
T13D4312-2:52a-39: nu ma gnyis kyi rtsa'i thad ka'i cha ni rgyab
T13D4312-2:52a-40: kyi sgal tshigs la brten cing gnas pa'i gnad ni
T13D4312-2:52a-41: rtsa bo che zhes bya ste /
T13D4312-2:52a-42: de phug na khrag zad nas 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52a-43: dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel ba yi //
T13D4312-2:52a-44: sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13D4312-2:52a-45: phrag pa gnyis kyi sog pa ste //
T13D4312-2:52a-46: de snad bskams shing tshor bral 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:52a-48: dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel ba'i gnas la /
T13D4312-2:52b-0: sgal tshigs kyi ngos gnyis @52b dang yang 'brel pa ni /
T13D4312-2:52b-1: sog pa zhes bya ba de la brten pa'i gnad yod do //
T13D4312-2:52b-2: de snad pas ni lag ngar bskams pa dang /
T13D4312-2:52b-3: tshor ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52b-4: mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis rtsa //
T13D4312-2:52b-5: dpung mgo dang ni mgrin pa'i bar //
T13D4312-2:52b-6: phrag pa phrag pa la brten gnad //
T13D4312-2:52b-7: da phug lag ngar bya ba nyams ;
T13D4312-2:52b-9: mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis kyi mtshams gnyis na dpung pa dang /
T13D4312-2:52b-10: mgo bo dang mgrin pa'i bar na gnas pa'i gnad phrag pa zhes bya ba yod de /
T13D4312-2:52b-11: de yang phrag pa la brten cing gnas la /
T13D4312-2:52b-12: de lta bu de phug na lag ngar gyi bya ba nyams shing 'jas te /
T13D4312-2:52b-13: brkyang ba ba dang bskum pa'i bya ba byed mi nus par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52b-14: srol gang gi ni ngos gnyis na //
T13D4312-2:52b-15: 'gram pa la ni brten pa'i rtsa //
T13D4312-2:52b-16: bzhi ste de la sngon po gnyis //
T13D4312-2:52b-17: gnyis pa'ang mjing pa'i gnad du bshad //
T13D4312-2:52b-18: de phug skad 'gags mi sdug dang //
T13D4312-2:52b-19: lce yis ro ni mi tshor 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:52b-21: srol gong gi ngos g-yas g-yon gnyis na 'gram pa la brten cing gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi yod de /
T13D4312-2:52b-22: rtsa de dag gi nang nas rtsa gnyis ni sngon po zhes bya ba'i gnad yin la /
T13D4312-2:52b-23: gnyis ni mjing pa'i gnad yin par bshad do //
T13D4312-2:52b-24: de phug cing bcad na skad 'gags pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52b-25: de la skad 'gags pa ni skad thams cad nas thams cad du 'gags par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52b-26: yang na mi sdug pa ste skad gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-2:52b-27: ro mi tshor zhing lce bem bem por 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52b-28: lkog ma'i sbubs kyi ngos gnyis nas //
T13D4312-2:52b-29: lce dang snar ni 'gro ba'i rtsa //
T13D4312-2:52b-30: so sor bzhi bzhi yod ma mo //
T13D4312-2:52b-33: lkog ma'i sbubs kyi g-yas g-yon gnyis nas lcer 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i rtsa dang /
T13D4312-2:52b-34: de bzhin du snar 'gro zhing rgyu ba'i rtsa so so zhing bzhi bzhi yod de /
T13D4312-2:52b-35: de ni ma mo zhes bya ba'i gnad yin te /
T13D4312-2:52b-36: de phug na skad cig ma de nyid la 'phral du srog 'joms shing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:52b-37: mgo bo ske mtshams ltag pa ste //
T13D4312-2:52b-38: de phug mgo bo ldem por 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:52b-40: mgo bo dang ske'i mtshams na ltag pa zhes bya
T13D4312-2:52b-41: ba'i gnad gnyis tshigs mtshams kyi ngos gnyis na gnas
T13D4312-2:53a-0: te / de phug na mgo bo ldem zhing 'dar bar @53a * //
T13D4312-2:53a-2: rna ba gnyis 'og lcong ba ni //
T13D4312-2:53a-5: rna ba gnyis kyi 'og na lcong zhing dma' ba na rna rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13D4312-2:53a-6: de gnyis phug na sgra thos ba 'joms shing 'on bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:53a-7: sna yi bu ga gnyis dang ni //
T13D4312-2:53a-8: sna yi lam 'gro mgrin nang gnas //
T13D4312-2:53a-9: sbrul mgo zhes bya de bcad na //
T13D4312-2:53a-10: dri mi tshor bar byed par 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:53a-12: sprul mgo zhes bya ba'i gnad kyi bye brag sna'i bu ga'i gnas g-yas g-yon gnyis dang /
T13D4312-2:53a-13: sna'i bu ga'i lam du 'gro ba dang /
T13D4312-2:53a-14: de bzhin du mgrin pa'i nang na gnas shing brten par byed de /
T13D4312-2:53a-15: de'i ming ni sbrul mgo can zhes bya ba ste /
T13D4312-2:53a-16: de bcad na dri mi tshor zhing sna'i dbang po nyams par byed do //
T13D4312-2:53a-17: mig gnyis kyi ni phyi rol mtshams //
T13D4312-2:53a-18: smin ma skyes pa'i mtha' yi 'og / mig zur smin steng dma' bar gnas //
T13D4312-2:53a-21: mig gnyis kyi phyi rol mur 'gram gyi phyogs kyi
T13D4312-2:53a-22: mtshams smin ma skyes pa'i rgyun chad pa'i mtha' 'og
T13D4312-2:53a-23: nas mig zur zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i gnad yod do
T13D4312-2:53a-24: // de bzhin du smin ma'i steng na dma' zhing
T13D4312-2:53a-25: lcong ba la 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod
T13D4312-2:53a-26: // de / mig zur dang 'khyil pa zhes bya
T13D4312-2:53a-27: ba ni gnad bzhi po de dag phug na skyes
T13D4312-2:53a-29: rna mchan dpral ba'i mtha' na ni //
T13D4312-2:53a-32: rna ba'i mchan dang dpral ba'i mtha' bar na mur 'gram zhes bya ba'i gnad gnyis yod de ;
T13D4312-2:53a-33: de phug na skyes bu de 'phral la 'chi zhing myur du dus byed par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:53a-34: mur 'gram gnyis steng skra mtshams na //
T13D4312-2:53a-35: gdeg pa zhes bya gzhag bya yang //
T13D4312-2:53a-36: smin mtshams bar gnas gsum char la'ang //
T13D4312-2:53a-37: zug rngu dag ni ma phyung zhing //
T13D4312-2:53a-38: smin nas rang nyid byung na 'tsho //
T13D4312-2:53a-41: mur 'gram gnyis kyi steng ma ltag skra mtshams kyi
T13D4312-2:53a-42: steng na gdeg pa zhes bya ba'i gnad yod la
T13D4312-2:53a-43: / yang gzhag par bya ba'i gnad ni smin mtshams kyi bar na yod de /
T13D4312-2:53a-44: gdeg pa gnyis po dang ldan pa ste /
T13D4312-2:53b-0: gnad gsum char la @53b mtshon gyi zug rngus zug na /
T13D4312-2:53b-1: de ma phyung bar dus gzhan zhig na smin nas
T13D4312-2:53b-2: rang nyid byung bar gyur na 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi
T13D4312-2:53b-3: zug de phyung na skyes bu de 'phral du 'chi
T13D4312-2:53b-4: bar 'gyur ro // lce mig sna dang rna ba yi //
T13D4312-2:53b-5: bu ga bzhi ni 'dus ba dag / rkan dang sgo ru kha bzhi ste //
T13D4312-2:53b-6: bu ga'i gnad ni de rnams kyi ;
T13D4312-2:53b-7: / gnad ni sum mdo ris zhes bya //
T13D4312-2:53b-10: lce dang mig dang sna dang rna ba'i bu ga ste /
T13D4312-2:53b-11: rtsa sgo bzhi po 'du zhing 'phrad par gyur ba
T13D4312-2:53b-12: dag / rkan gyi phyogs su kha bzhi par gnas
T13D4312-2:53b-13: pa dang / de bzhin du bu ga dang 'brel ba'i gnad ni sum mdo ris zhes bya ste /
T13D4312-2:53b-14: gnad de rnams bcad na skyes bu'i srog 'phral du 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:53b-15: thod pa yi ni mtshams lnga po //
T13D4312-2:53b-16: thad ka gyen 'gro mtshams kyi mtha' //
T13D4312-2:53b-17: de snad pas ni mgo 'khor dang //
T13D4312-2:53b-18: smyo zhing dran pa nyams te 'chi //
T13D4312-2:53b-20: mgo bo'i thod pa'i mtshams lnga po ni /
T13D4312-2:53b-21: mtshams kyi mtha' zhes bya ba'i gnad yod de /
T13D4312-2:53b-22: de thad ka dang gyen du 'gro bas gnas pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:53b-23: mtshams kyi mtha'i gnad de rnams snad bas ni mgo 'khor ba dang /
T13D4312-2:53b-24: smyo zhing dran pa nyams pa'i nad kyis skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:53b-25: spyi bo'i steng na gtsug 'khyil ba'i //
T13D4312-2:53b-26: rtsa dang ldan sbubs 'dus pa na //
T13D4312-2:53b-27: spu 'khyil bdag po zhes bya ba'i //
T13D4312-2:53b-28: gnad kyis srog ni 'jig par byed //
T13D4312-2:53b-30: mgo bo'i steng gi gtsug rtsa 'khyil pa'i mtshams 'dus
T13D4312-2:53b-31: pa spu 'khyil ba'i gnas kyi gnad ni ming bdag
T13D4312-2:53b-33: gnad de bcom pa na srog 'phral du 'jig cing 'dor bar 'gyur ro ;
T13D4312-2:53b-34: / gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul //
T13D4312-2:53b-35: rab na de ni gnad ces bya //
T13D4312-2:53b-37: 'di ni yang gnad rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:53b-38: lus kyi phyogs gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul zhing 'phar ba dang /
T13D4312-2:53b-39: yang de bzhin du mnan par gyur na mi bzod
T13D4312-2:53b-40: par na ba de ni gnad yin par shes par
T13D4312-2:53b-41: bya'o // sha rgyus rus pa rtsa chen dang //
T13D4312-2:53b-42: rtsa dang tshigs ni 'dus pa ru //
T13D4312-2:53b-43: gnad ces bya ste des na der //
T13D4312-2:53b-44: srog ni lhag par gnas pa yin //
T13D4312-2:53b-46: sha la sogs pa nas tshigs kyi bar rang rang
T13D4312-2:53b-47: gi rigs mthun pa la ltos pa 'dus shing phrad
T13D4312-2:54a-0: par gyur pa de ni gnad ces @54a * //
T13D4312-2:54a-2: de ni na zhing mi bde bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:54a-3: rgyu des na gnad rnams su srog lhag par gnas
T13D4312-2:54a-4: pa yin pas der gnod pa byas pas srog la
T13D4312-2:54a-5: lhag par gnod pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:54a-6: mang du rnam par bstan mod kyi //

T13D4312-2:55a-33: yang na dbang po nyams shing mi gsal ba'am /
T13D4312-2:55a-35: rtsa chen gnad bcad lbu ba dang //

T13D4312-2:55b-13: lus kun skem zhing sbeg pa dang /

T13D4312-2:57a-13: tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pa'i phyir /
T13D4312-2:57a-14: rtsa thams cad kyang 'khums shing gcod par byed pa
T13D4312-2:57a-15: yin no de la srog chags rnams kyi srog /
T13D4312-2:57a-16: khrag gnas na ni gnas pa yin //
T13D4312-2:57a-18: de la srog chags rnams kyi srog ni shas cher khrag la gnas pa'i phyir /

T13D4312-2:57a-20: srog de yang gnas par 'gyur ba yin no //

T13D4312-2:63b-32: sngo ba la sogs su gnas pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:63b-33: rlung ni nad 'chi sdug bsngal skyed //
T13D4312-2:63b-35: de dag gi nang nas rlung gi gzugs brnyan ni nad rnams skyed pa dang /
T13D4312-2:63b-36: 'chi ba dang sdug bsngal zhing nyon mongs pa chen po skyed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:63b-37: gzhan dag bde ba skyed pa yin //
T13D4312-2:63b-39: gzugs brnyan nam mdog mdangs de las gzhan pa'i phyi
T13D4312-2:63b-40: ma bzhi po ni bde ba skyed cing dge ba
T13D4312-2:63b-41: ston pa dang / nad med pa skyed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:63b-42: me yis thams cad mdog can te //
T13D4312-2:63b-43: de ni rnam pa bdun du bshad //
T13D4312-2:63b-44: dmar dang ser dkar nag po dang //
T13D4312-2:63b-45: ljang nag skyu dang gnag pa'o //
T13D4312-2:63b-47: mdog can thams cad ni me'i rang bzhin las byung ba yin par bshad de /
T13D4312-2:63b-48: de yang dmar dang ser ba la sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye bas rnam pa bdun yin no //
T13D4312-2:63b-49: de rnams las ni gang gsal 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:63b-50: snum dang dri ma med de dge //
T13D4312-2:63b-51: dri ma can dang rtsub pa dang //
T13D4312-2:63b-52: zhum pa sdug bsngal skyed pa yin //
T13D4312-2:64a-1: de rnams kyi nang nas gang zhig snang zhing gsal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-2:64a-3: dri ma med cing nag nog dang bral ba de ni dge zhing bde ba skyed pa yin /
T13D4312-2:64a-4: dri ma can dang kha dog rtsub pa dang /
T13D4312-2:64a-5: zhum zhing rgyas pa ma yin pa rnams ni mi dge ste /
T13D4312-2:64a-6: sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:64a-7: mdangs kyi mdog ni zil gyis gnon //
T13D4312-2:64a-8: 'od ni kha dog gsal byed yin //
T13D4312-2:64a-10: mdog dang mdangs kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T13D4312-2:64a-11: mdangs kyi kha dog gi rnam pa nag po dang /
T13D4312-2:64a-12: dkar po la sogs pa zil gyis mnan nas der gnas pa yin la /
T13D4312-2:64a-13: 'od kyi rnam pa ni lus kyi kha dog gsal shing che bar gyur pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:64a-14: mdangs kyis nye bar snang ba yin //
T13D4312-2:64a-15: 'di ni ring nas snang ba yin //
T13D4312-2:64a-17: gzi mdangs kyi rnam pa gang nye bar snang ba yin la /
T13D4312-2:64a-18: 'byung ba lnga'i 'od ni thag ring po nas snang ba ste /
T13D4312-2:64a-19: de'i khyad par ni de yin no //
T13D4312-2:64a-20: gang zhig mdangs dang kha dog gi //
T13D4312-2:64a-21: mtshan ma'i khyad par med min te //
T13D4312-2:64a-22: mi rnams mtshan ma bzang ngan 'byung //
T13D4312-2:64a-23: dus su mdangs la brten pa yin //
T13D4312-2:64a-25: mi rnams la ni mdangs med pa dang /
T13D4312-2:64a-26: kha dog gi khyad par 'ga' yang med pa ma yin te /
T13D4312-2:64a-27: thams cad kyang mdangs kyang mdog dang bcas pa yin pas de dang bral ba ma yin no //
T13D4312-2:64a-28: des na mi rnams kyi mtshan ma'am /
T13D4312-2:64a-29: ltas bzang po dang ngan pa 'byung ba'i dus su
T13D4312-2:64a-30: mdangs la brten cing gnas nas de'i khyad par ston
T13D4312-2:64a-32: gang zhig rkang pa 'drud pa dang //
T13D4312-2:64a-33: phrag pa g-yo bas 'gro ba dang //
T13D4312-2:64a-35: skyes bu gang zhig rkang pas sa la drud cing 'gro ba dang /
T13D4312-2:64a-36: de bzhin phrag pa g-yo zhing 'gul bas 'gro ba
T13D4312-2:64a-37: de yang 'chi bdag gi dbang du 'gro ba yin
T13D4312-2:64a-38: no // gang zhig phan zas mang zos kyang //
T13D4312-2:64a-39: rtag tu stobs ni nyams 'gyur dang //
T13D4312-2:64a-41: gang zhig gis phan zhing rjes su mthun pa'i zas
T13D4312-2:64a-42: mang zhing lhag par zos su zin kyang rgyun mi
T13D4312-2:64a-43: 'chad par stobs nyams shing 'bri bar 'gyur ba yang
T13D4312-2:64a-45: gang zhig nyung zos bshang gci mang //
T13D4312-2:64a-46: mang zos bshang gci nyung ba dang //
T13D4312-2:64a-48: yang gang zhig zas nyung ba zos kyang bshang ba dang gci ba mang zhing 'byung ba dang /
T13D4312-2:64a-49: de las go bzlog pa dag kyang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13D4312-2:64a-50: nyung zos bad kan gyis nyen cing //
T13D4312-2:64b-2: gang zhig zas nyung du zos kyang /
T13D4312-2:64b-3: bad kan gyis nyen cing gzir ba dang /
T13D4312-2:64b-4: dbugs mi bde pa ring bor 'byin cing sa la 'gre ldog na yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13D4312-2:64b-5: gang zhig dbugs ring phyung nas ni //
T13D4312-2:64b-6: thung ngu rngubs te shugs 'byin dang //
T13D4312-2:64b-8: yang gang zhig dbugs gyen du 'byin pa ring du phyung nas /
T13D4312-2:64b-9: de'i 'og tu thung ngu rngubs te shugs 'byin cing sdug bsngal bar byed pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13D4312-2:64b-10: thung ngu 'byin cing bsnun pa ltar //
T13D4312-2:64b-11: shin tu 'dar bar byed pa dang //
T13D4312-2:64b-13: gang zhig dbugs kyi rgyun thung ngu 'byin cing /
T13D4312-2:64b-14: de'i 'og tu bsnun pa ltar shin tu 'gul zhing 'dar bar byed pa yang 'chi ltas yin no //
T13D4312-2:64b-15: gang zhig lag ngar bskum nas ni //
T13D4312-2:64b-16: mgo ni dka' bas 'degs pa dang //
T13D4312-2:64b-18: yang gang zhig lag ngar bskum nas mgo bo shin
T13D4312-2:64b-19: tu dka' bas 'degs shing bskyod pa yang 'chi bar
T13D4312-2:64b-20: 'gyur ro // gang zhig dpral ba las rdul 'dzag / tshigs mtshams lhod par gyur pa dang //
T13D4312-2:64b-22: yang gang zhig dpral ba'i phyogs nas rgyu med par
T13D4312-2:64b-23: rdul 'dzag pa dang rus pa'i tshigs kyi bog re
T13D4312-2:64b-24: lhod par byed pa yang de bzhin no //
T13D4312-2:64b-25: nyams che ba'am nyam chung gyur pa gang //
T13D4312-2:64b-26: ldong ba'i tshe na mi dran 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:64b-28: gang zhig nyams stobs dang ldan nam //
T13D4312-2:64b-29: nyam chung bar gyur kyang rung ste /
T13D4312-2:64b-30: mal nas ldang ba'i skabs su mi dran zhing myong bar 'gyur ba yang de bzhin no //
T13D4312-2:64b-31: gang zhig gan rkyal nyal nas ni //
T13D4312-2:64b-32: rkang pa rnam par bskyod pa dang //
T13D4312-2:64b-34: gang zhig glo gnyis mi 'bebs par gan rkyal du
T13D4312-2:64b-35: nyal zhing rkang pa rnam par bskyod cing 'gul bar
T13D4312-2:64b-37: rtsig pa mal stan la sogs par //
T13D4312-2:64b-38: gang zhig rtag tu snyes pa dang //
T13D4312-2:64b-40: gang zhig nyam chung bas rtsig pa la sogs par rtag tu snyes pa yang de bzhin no //
T13D4312-2:64b-41: rgyu med par dgod myos tshul gyis //
T13D4312-2:64b-42: mchu las ldags par byed ba dang //
T13D4312-2:64b-44: dgod pa la sogs pa'i rgyu med par shas cher dgod pa dang /
T13D4312-2:64b-45: myos shing mi dran pa'i tshul gyis mchu ldags par byed pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13D4312-2:64b-46: ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang //
T13D4312-2:64b-47: sgra bcas par yang gang byed pa //
T13D4312-2:64b-49: lces ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang /
T13D4312-2:64b-50: kha nas sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa yang 'chi ltas so //
T13D4312-2:64b-51: lus mdog nag po ser po dang //
T13D4312-2:65a-3: yang mi gang gi mdog nag po la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-2:65a-4: gzugs brnyan du snang ba yang gshin rje'i dbang du
T13D4312-2:65a-6: sman pa sman dang kha zas dang //
T13D4312-2:65a-7: bla ma mdza' bshes la sdang gang //
T13D4312-2:65a-8: 'di dag thams cad gshin rje yi //
T13D4312-2:65a-9: dbang gyur yin par shes par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:65a-11: yang skyes bu gang zhig sman la sogs pa la zhe sdang ba gang yin pa dang /
T13D4312-2:65a-12: sngar bshad pa thams cad kyang gshin rje'i dbang du
T13D4312-2:65a-13: gyur cing 'chi ba yin par shes shing rtogs par
T13D4312-2:65a-14: bya'o // gang zhig drod chung sems g-yengs dang //
T13D4312-2:65a-15: rtag tu mdangs ngan yid mi bde //
T13D4312-2:65a-17: yang mi gang khong pa'i me drod chung zhing zhan pa dang /
T13D4312-2:65a-18: sems g-yengs shing rtag tu 'khrugs pa dang /
T13D4312-2:65a-20: yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyis non pa de yang ming 'tsho'o //
T13D4312-2:65a-21: gang zhig gtor ma bya rog la //
T13D4312-2:65a-22: byin yang za bar mi byed dang //
T13D4312-2:65a-24: yang mi gang zhig gi phyir de'i ming nas smos
T13D4312-2:65a-25: te gtor ma byin zhing gtor ma bya rog la
T13D4312-2:65a-26: sogs pas mthong nas za bar mi byed pa de
T13D4312-2:65a-27: yang gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:65a-28: gang zhig rgyu med yid gzhungs dang //
T13D4312-2:65a-29: mdzes shing lus rgyas dpal thob ba'am //
T13D4312-2:65a-30: de las nyams par gyur pa dag / de ni
T13D4312-2:65a-31: gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug / ces bya ba la
T13D4312-2:65a-32: / yid gzhungs pa la sogs pa'i rgyu bcud kyis
T13D4312-2:65a-33: len pa la sogs pa med par yid gzhungs shing
T13D4312-2:65a-36: lus kyi sha rgyas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:65a-37: dpal gyi 'byor pa glo bur du thob bar gyur ba'am /
T13D4312-2:65a-38: yang na yid gzhungs pa la sogs pa snga na yod pa las /
T13D4312-2:65a-39: rgyu med par glo bur du nyams par 'gyur ba dag kyang yod de //
T13D4312-2:65a-40: de dag ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug cing 'gro ba'i ltas yin no //
T13D4312-2:65a-41: tha mal ba'am nad pa yis //
T13D4312-2:65a-42: gang gi yon tan skyon rang bzhin //
T13D4312-2:65a-43: snga las gzhan du 'gyur bar snang //
T13D4312-2:65a-44: de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho //
T13D4312-2:65a-46: skyes bu tha mal bar gnas shing /
T13D4312-2:65a-47: nad med pa'am nad pa yang rung ste /
T13D4312-2:65a-48: snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin dang /
T13D4312-2:65a-49: rlung la sogs pa'i skyon gyi rang bzhin snga ma las gzhan du 'gyur te /
T13D4312-2:65a-50: rang gi rang bzhin spangs nas dngos po gzhan du
T13D4312-2:65a-51: gyur na skyes bu de yang zla ba drug las
T13D4312-2:65a-52: mi 'tsho'o // dad dang tshul khrims dran dang sbyin //
T13D4312-2:65a-53: blo gros stobs ni rgyu med bar //
T13D4312-2:65a-54: 'di drug las ni ldog gyur ba //
T13D4312-2:65b-2: yang gang zhig dad pa la sogs pa'i chos drug
T13D4312-2:65b-3: las rgyu med par ldog par gyur pa yang 'chi
T13D4312-2:65b-4: bar 'gyur ro // de la dad pa ni lha
T13D4312-2:65b-5: la sogs pa la yid dang zhing mnyes par byed
T13D4312-2:65b-6: bar 'gyur ro // pa'o // tshul khrims ni sdom pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T13D4312-2:65b-7: dran pa ni 'das pa'i dngos po mi brjed pa'o //
T13D4312-2:65b-8: sbyin pa ni gtong ba'i dang tshul can no //
T13D4312-2:65b-10: stobs ni lus kyi nus pa'o //
T13D4312-2:65b-13: skra byi ba na tshor ba med //
T13D4312-2:65b-17: smar ba'i tshig smyon pa lta bur 'chol bar spyod pa dang /
T13D4312-2:65b-18: lus 'dar zhing sems rmongs par gyur pa dag ni zla ba gcig nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:65b-19: yang de bzhin du skra byi zhing bregs ba na
T13D4312-2:65b-20: tshor ba med par 'gyur ba'i mi yang zhag drug
T13D4312-2:65b-22: gang zhig lkog nad med pa ru //
T13D4312-2:65b-23: mid par kha zas mi chud dang //
T13D4312-2:65b-25: yang mi gang zhig lkog ma'i nad gang yang med
T13D4312-2:65b-26: par zas ma tshud cing thogs pa de yang 'chi
T13D4312-2:65b-27: ltas yin no // bran g-yog log par byed gyur pa //
T13D4312-2:65b-30: yang mi gang zhig gi bran g-yog gam bsnyen bkur
T13D4312-2:65b-31: ba log par byed cing rgyu med par mi mthun
T13D4312-2:65b-32: bar byed pa de 'chi ltas yin te /
T13D4312-2:65b-33: 'chi ba dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:65b-34: gang zhig rtag tu gnyid log pa'am //
T13D4312-2:65b-37: yang skyes bu gang zhig nyin mtshan rtag par gnyid log ba'am /
T13D4312-2:65b-38: gnyid med pa de yang mi 'tsho'o //
T13D4312-2:65b-39: mchi mas gdong ni khebs pa dang //
T13D4312-2:65b-40: rkang pa shin tu rdul ba dang //
T13D4312-2:65b-41: mig ni mi sdug par snang ba //
T13D4312-2:65b-44: gang zhig rgyu med par mchi mas gdong khebs par du ba dang /
T13D4312-2:65b-45: de bzhin du rkang pa shas cher rdul ba dang /
T13D4312-2:65b-46: de bzhin du mig mi sdug cing rnyog ba can
T13D4312-2:65b-47: du snang ba de yang gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro
T13D4312-2:65b-48: bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin no //
T13D4312-2:65b-49: sngon chad dga' ba'i dngos la gang //
T13D4312-2:65b-52: gang gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la sngon chad
T13D4312-2:65b-53: dga' zhing rtsed mo nyams su myang ba las dngos
T13D4312-2:65b-54: po de nyid la 'phral du mi dga' bar 'byung
T13D4312-2:66a-2: 'phral du ldog par 'gyur ba dag / de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:66a-4: yang mi gang zhig rgyu med par 'phral du glo
T13D4312-2:66a-5: bur 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid rims la sogs pa mtshan
T13D4312-2:66a-6: nyid ba'am / yang de lta bur 'gyur ba dag
T13D4312-2:66a-7: bcos shing zhi ba'i rgyu med par ldog cing zhi
T13D4312-2:66a-8: bar 'gyur na skyes bu de ni ring po mi
T13D4312-2:66a-9: thogs par de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:66a-10: rims ni stobs dang ldan pa dang //
T13D4312-2:66a-11: gting du zhen cing yun ring dang //
T13D4312-2:66a-12: bla bcas mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde //
T13D4312-2:66a-13: rid cing skrangs dang me drod nyams //
T13D4312-2:66a-14: tshig mi gsal zhing thogs pa dang //
T13D4312-2:66a-15: mig dmar snying ni gzer ba dang //
T13D4312-2:66a-16: snga dro lud pa skam po 'byung //
T13D4312-2:66a-17: phyi dro de las gzhan du 'gyur //
T13D4312-2:66a-18: bad kan lud par bcas pa dang //
T13D4312-2:66a-19: stobs dang sha ni zad nas 'chi //
T13D4312-2:66a-21: rims kyi nad ni stobs dang ldan pa la sogs
T13D4312-2:66a-22: pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan nas skyes bu 'chi bar
T13D4312-2:66a-23: 'gyur ro // de yang stobs dang ldan pa'i nad tshabs che ba'o //
T13D4312-2:66a-24: gting du zhen pa ni lus zungs thams cad kyi
T13D4312-2:66a-25: nang du phyin pas gting ring ba'i mtshan nyid can
T13D4312-2:66a-26: no // yun ring ba'i dus lon pa'o //
T13D4312-2:66a-27: bla ba ni 'brel ba med pa'i tshig mang du smra ba de dang bcas pa'o //
T13D4312-2:66a-29: dbugs mi bde ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:66a-30: rid cing lus zungs zad pa dang /
T13D4312-2:66a-32: me drod nyams shing bri ba dang /
T13D4312-2:66a-33: tshig mi gsal zhing brda sprod mi nus pa dang /
T13D4312-2:66a-34: tshig thogs shing mi thon pa dang /
T13D4312-2:66a-36: snying ga na zhing gzer ba'i rims de lta bus ni nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:66a-37: de bzhin du rims kyis thebs pa'i gang zhig snga dro lud pa skam po 'byung ba'am /
T13D4312-2:66a-38: phyi dro de las gzhan pa'i bad kan gyi bdag nyid can gyi lud pa 'byung ba dang /
T13D4312-2:66a-39: sha zad par 'gyur bas nad pa de 'chi bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:66a-40: khrag dang mkhris pa shin tu dmar //
T13D4312-2:66a-41: yang na gnag pa'am mtshon can nam //
T13D4312-2:66a-42: dmar dang ser dang ljang mdog dang //
T13D4312-2:66a-43: khrag gi gzugs ni rab tu snang //
T13D4312-2:66a-44: ba spu'i bu ga nas 'dzag pa //
T13D4312-2:66a-45: lkog ma snying gar gos pa dang //
T13D4312-2:66a-46: gos la ma chags dri nga ba //
T13D4312-2:66a-48: rgan po skya rbab rims thabs skyug / lud pa skrang dang tshad 'khru gsod //
T13D4312-2:66b-0: khrag dang @66b mkhris pa'i nad ni tshul 'di 'dra na skyes bu gsod par byed do //
T13D4312-2:66b-1: shin tu dmar ba ni shas cher dmar ba'o //
T13D4312-2:66b-2: yang na shin tu gnag pa dang //
T13D4312-2:66b-3: tshon can de dag kha dog sna tshogs par snang zhing 'ja' ltar snang ba dang /
T13D4312-2:66b-4: zangs ltar dmar ba la sogs pa'i gzugs su khrag gi mdog ltar snang na 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am //
T13D4312-2:66b-5: gsod par byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:66b-6: yang de bzhin du ba spu'i bu ga rnams las
T13D4312-2:66b-7: 'dzag cing 'byung ba dang lkog ma dang snying ga
T13D4312-2:66b-8: dang kha'i phyogs su cig car gos shing chags pa
T13D4312-2:66b-9: dang / de bzhin du khrag mkhris pa gang gos la chags ba dang /
T13D4312-2:66b-10: de bzhin du mi 'dod pa dang /
T13D4312-2:66b-11: de bzhin du shin tu dri mnam zhing mi zhim pa dang /
T13D4312-2:66b-12: de bzhin du shugs kyis 'byung zhing 'chad nas kyang 'byung ba dang /
T13D4312-2:66b-13: shin tu mang du 'byung na yang gsod par byed do //
T13D4312-2:66b-14: de bzhin du rgas shing na tshod yal ba dang /
T13D4312-2:66b-15: skya rbab dang rims kyis btab cing skyug pa dang /
T13D4312-2:66b-16: lud pa lu zhing grang ba dang /
T13D4312-2:66b-17: tshad pas 'khru ba'i bla brnan dang ldan yang gsod par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:66b-18: lud pa dbugs mi bde rims skyugs //
T13D4312-2:66b-21: lud pa lu ba dang dbugs mi bde bas thebs
T13D4312-2:66b-22: pa'i skyes bu ni rims la sogs pa dang ldan
T13D4312-2:66b-24: / gcong chen sbos dang rtsib logs gzer //
T13D4312-2:66b-25: khrag skyugs phrag pa tsha na 'chi //
T13D4312-2:66b-27: gcong chen pos thebs pa'i nad pa ni //
T13D4312-2:66b-28: sbos pa la sogs pa dang ldan na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:66b-29: skyugs pa shugs dang ldan pa dang //
T13D4312-2:66b-30: bshang gci dri yod tshon can dang //
T13D4312-2:66b-31: lud pa bshang nag khrag dang bcas //
T13D4312-2:66b-32: dbugs mi bde yun ring na 'chi //

T13D4312-2:85b-37: dngos su na nad kyi gnas bcud rgyu bar byed
