T13D4312-2:318b-8: skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha khu dang sbyar ba'i
T13D4312-2:318b-9: 'bras chan nyung shas tsam sbyin par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:318b-10: 'o ma can shing khu ba yis //
T13D4312-2:318b-11: rma ni bkrus nas btsod dang ni //
T13D4312-2:318b-12: shing mngar pra punda r'i ka / seng phrom dkar pos bsku bar bya //
T13D4312-2:318b-14: rma de 'o ma can gyi shing bskol ba'i khu
T13D4312-2:318b-15: bas rma bkrus nas btsod la sogs pa'i lde gus
T13D4312-2:318b-16: bsku bar bya'o // rma bsku'i sman ni 'di dag nyid //
T13D4312-2:318b-17: skyer bcas til mar bskol te bsku //
T13D4312-2:318b-19: rma bsku ba ni btsod la sogs pa bshad ma
T13D4312-2:318b-20: thag pa 'di dag nyid skyer pa dang bcas pa
T13D4312-2:318b-21: til mar bskol ba des kyang rma bsku bar bya'o
T13D4312-2:318b-22: // 'di yis rma zhag bcu dugs bya //
T13D4312-2:318b-24: yang nad pa'i rma'i nang du sbrang rtsi bcug cing zhag bcu'i bar du dugs bya'o //
T13D4312-2:318b-25: gcin gyi lam ni zhag bdun du //
T13D4312-2:318b-26: rang gi lam nas ma byung na //
T13D4312-2:318b-27: rde'u 'i rma ni me yis bsregs //
T13D4312-2:318b-29: zhag bdun nas gcin rgyu ba'i rang gi lam pho
T13D4312-2:318b-30: mtshan las byung bar ma gyur na rde'u dbral ba'i
T13D4312-2:318b-31: rma de rma de sman pas mes bsreg par bya'o
T13D4312-2:318b-32: // rang gi lam nas byung gyur nas //
T13D4312-2:318b-33: phal cher mas gtong mngar bas gso //
T13D4312-2:318b-35: gcin rang gi lam nas byung bar gyur nas /
T13D4312-2:318b-36: nad pa de la phal cher de mang du mngar
T13D4312-2:318b-37: ba'i sman dang bskol ba'i mas gtong ba gsum po
T13D4312-2:318b-38: mas gtong ba gong ma dang 'jam rtsi dang ni
T13D4312-2:318b-40: rma de 'tsho bas kyang lo gcig bar //
T13D4312-2:318b-41: ri bo glang po rta dang ni //
T13D4312-2:318b-42: shing la 'dzeg bar mi bya zhing //
T13D4312-2:318b-43: shing rtar mi zhon nyal po spang //
T13D4312-2:318b-44: chu la rgyal bar mi bya'o //
T13D4312-2:318b-46: rde'u bton pa'i nad pa de'i rma de 'tshobs shing
T13D4312-2:318b-47: sobs par gyur kyang lo gcig gi bar du ri
T13D4312-2:318b-48: bo la sogs pa la 'dzeg cing zhon bar mi
T13D4312-2:318b-49: byed pa dang / rkyal ba'i bar du mi bya'o //
T13D4312-2:318b-50: khu chu gcin rgyu lgang pa dang //
T13D4312-2:318b-51: rlig sbubs mtshams srubs gzhang dang ni //
T13D4312-2:318b-52: pho mtshan mo mtshan rtse mo ste //
T13D4312-2:319a-3: rde'u 'byin pa'i mtshon gyi las byed pa /
T13D4312-2:319a-5: gcin rgyu ba'i gnas dang lgang pa rlig pa'i nang
T13D4312-2:319a-6: ni sbubs mtshams kyi srubs dang pho mtshan dang mtshan
T13D4312-2:319a-7: dang mo mtshan gyi rtse mo 'dzag pa'i sa brgyad
T13D4312-2:319a-8: po de dag tu mtshon gyis btab par mi bya
T13D4312-2:319a-9: ste / gtsags bus gdab pa spang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:319a-10: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa
T13D4312-2:319a-11: tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob
T13D4312-2:319a-12: dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba
T13D4312-2:319a-13: las / gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13D4312-2:319a-15: // / de nas gcin snyi ba za khu'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:319a-17: go rims kyis na 'di'i gso ba brtsams pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:319a-18: za khu can ni stobs ldan la //
T13D4312-2:319a-19: dang po skyug sman bkru sman ni //
T13D4312-2:319a-20: snum can yungs kar aa rishta //
T13D4312-2:319a-21: ba ru ra dang kar nydza'i //
T13D4312-2:319a-22: snum dang gze ma til mar bskol //
T13D4312-2:319a-23: rang sman ji bzhin bskol ba yi //
T13D4312-2:319a-24: snum can skyug sman bkru sman gtang //
T13D4312-2:319a-26: gcin nad can gyi mi nyams stobs dang ldan pa ni /
T13D4312-2:319a-27: dang po kho nar gso ba gzhan pas sngar skyug sman dang bkru sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:319a-28: de yang yungs kar la sogs ba las byung ba'i snum mam /
T13D4312-2:319a-29: gze ma la sogs pa'i sman mar 'di nyid kyi
T13D4312-2:319a-30: 'og nas bshad pa rang gi sman dang ji lta
T13D4312-2:319a-31: ba bzhin du bskol ba'i til mar gyis snum gyi
T13D4312-2:319a-32: cho ga bya'o // gla sgang thang shing dong gra bcug / bye'u rug la sogs khu ba yi //
T13D4312-2:319a-33: 'jam rtsi de nas gtang bar bya //
T13D4312-2:319a-35: de nas nyams brtas la gla sgang la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-2:319a-36: lde gur bcug ba'i byi'u rug pa la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-2:319a-37: khu ba dang bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o
T13D4312-2:319a-38: // mkhris pa n+ya gro dha la sogs //
T13D4312-2:319a-40: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i gcin nad za gu la
T13D4312-2:319a-41: ni n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i sman dang bskol
T13D4312-2:319a-43: sbyangs nas sha khus brta bar bya //
T13D4312-2:319a-45: de'i 'og tu sbyangs pa byas pa'i gcin nad de la skam sa'i sha khus brta bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:319a-46: gcin nad dang ni skran dang ni //
T13D4312-2:319a-47: skem zhing nyams mi smad pa 'byung //
T13D4312-2:319a-48: de bas rjes 'brel bsrung ba'i phyir //
T13D4312-2:319a-49: zhi bar bya ba gtang bar bya //
T13D4312-2:319b-0: gcin @319b snyi ba'i nad dang ldan pa la khyad par du ni gcin sri ba dang /
T13D4312-2:319b-1: lgang ba dang pho mtshan na ba dang skran la
T13D4312-2:319b-2: sogs ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir nad dang
T13D4312-2:319b-3: rjes su 'brel pa de las bsrung zhing zhi bar
T13D4312-2:319b-4: bya ba'i phyir sman 'og nas 'byung ba dag gtang
T13D4312-2:319b-5: bar bya'o // sbyang pa ma byas la de nyid //
T13D4312-2:319b-6: gcin nad can ni kun la blud //
T13D4312-2:319b-8: skyug sman la sogs ba'i sbyang ba ma byas pa'i gcin nad can la ni /
T13D4312-2:319b-9: sngar bshad pa'i sman gyi khu ba de dag nyid gcin snyi ba'i nad la blud bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:319b-10: skyer ba skyu ru ra bskol khu //
T13D4312-2:319b-11: sbrang rtsir bcas pa nad par blud //
T13D4312-2:319b-13: skyu ru ra dang skyer pa bskol ba'i khu ba
T13D4312-2:319b-14: bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa blud par
T13D4312-2:319b-15: bya'o // skyer pa thang shing 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-2:319b-16: gla sgang chu bskol blud ba'ang phan //
T13D4312-2:319b-18: yang na gcin snyi ba'i nad la skyer pa la sogs pa bskol ba blud na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:319b-19: tsi tra skyer pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-2:319b-20: dug mo yungs ni sprad rtsir bcas //
T13D4312-2:319b-22: yang na kru trug tres la sogs pa'i sman bskol
T13D4312-2:319b-23: ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa byin na yang phan
T13D4312-2:319b-24: no // yang na sle tres skyu ru ra //
T13D4312-2:319b-25: sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i khu ba'ang phan //
T13D4312-2:319b-28: skyu ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blud na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:319b-29: seng phrom gla sgang kang pa la dang aa ru ra //
T13D4312-2:319b-30: pa ta byi tsher byi dang ga dang aardzu na //
T13D4312-2:319b-31: seng ldeng skyer pa byi dang ga dang dar ba bskol //
T13D4312-2:319b-32: khu ba gsum po sbrang rtsir bcas bas bad kan sel //
T13D4312-2:319b-34: seng phrom la sogs pa'i tshig rkang gsum gyis smos
T13D4312-2:319b-35: pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba gsum po de dag
T13D4312-2:319b-36: bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad la
T13D4312-2:319b-37: phan no // mkhris gyur pu shel seng phrom tsandan aa rdzun //
T13D4312-2:319b-38: nim pa ba to la dang sle tres skyu ru ra //
T13D4312-2:319b-39: seng phrom ba la ka dang skyer pa da ta ka'i //
T13D4312-2:319b-40: gsum po de dag bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud //
T13D4312-2:319b-42: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad la
T13D4312-2:319b-43: ni du shel tsi la sogs pa tshig rkang gsum
T13D4312-2:319b-44: gyis bshad ba'i sman gyi khu ba gsum blud na
T13D4312-2:319b-45: phan no // 'di dag ji bzhin zas skom dang //
T13D4312-2:319b-46: nas dang gro dang sbyar ba dang //
T13D4312-2:320a-0: rlung shas che ba'i gcin snyi @320a * //
T13D4312-2:320a-2: / snum dang sbyar te sbyin par bya //
T13D4312-2:320a-4: sman khur bskol ba'i sman 'di dag gis nad dmigs
T13D4312-2:320a-5: ji bzhin du zas skom la sogs pa dang sbyar
T13D4312-2:320a-6: te btang ba dang yang phan la rlung shas rgyas
T13D4312-2:320a-7: par gyur ba'i gcin snyi ba la ni sman 'di
T13D4312-2:320a-8: dag nyid snum dang sbyar te sbyin par bya'o ;
T13D4312-2:320a-9: / lci ba rta rtug las byung ba'am //
T13D4312-2:320a-10: 'od ma las ni skyes ba dag / khur ba zan dron chag tshe sogs //
T13D4312-2:320a-11: nas las byas ba'i zan kyang ban //
T13D4312-2:320a-13: ba lang gi lci ba dang rta sbangs las byung
T13D4312-2:320a-14: ba'i nas sam 'od ma las skyes pa'i nas gang
T13D4312-2:320a-15: yang rung ba dag khur skya dang zan dron la
T13D4312-2:320a-16: sogs par byas te byin na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:320a-18: 'bras rnying drug cu ba rnying phan //
T13D4312-2:320a-20: rtsa 'bru'i rnam ba dang khre dang ci tse la
T13D4312-2:320a-21: sogs ba dang mungga la sogs pa gang bu can
T13D4312-2:320a-22: gyi 'bru'i sde tshan la sogs pa dang /
T13D4312-2:320a-23: 'bras rnying pa lo gcig lon pa dang 'bras drug
T13D4312-2:320a-24: cu pa rnying pa las byas pa'i kha zas kyang
T13D4312-2:320a-25: gcin snyi ba'i nad la phan no //
T13D4312-2:320a-26: yungs kar til btsir las byung ba'am //
T13D4312-2:320a-27: sbyar thug skyur dang bcas pa'am //
T13D4312-2:320a-29: yungs kar dang til btsir ba'i 'ba' cha las g-yos su byas pa'am /
T13D4312-2:320a-30: sbyar thug kha la ka zhes bya ba bskyur dang bcas ba yang de'i nad la phan no //
T13D4312-2:320a-31: ka pid tha dang tin tu ka /'dzam bu de sbyar btung ba dang //
T13D4312-2:320a-33: yang ka pid tha la sogs ba'i shing thog sbyin pa'am /
T13D4312-2:320a-34: yang na de dang sbyar ba'i btung ba ro drug ba zhes bya ba byin na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:320a-35: tshod ma kha bo sbrang rtsi dang //
T13D4312-2:320a-36: 'bras bu gsum zan bza' ba skam //
T13D4312-2:320a-38: ba to la dang sa ba ta la las byas
T13D4312-2:320a-39: pa'i tshod ma ro khab la sogs pa dang bza'
T13D4312-2:320a-41: la du dang snum khur la sogs pa yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:320a-42: skam sa'i sha ni bsregs pa dang //
T13D4312-2:320a-43: skams pa'am lcags dang g-yos pa dang //
T13D4312-2:320a-45: yang na skam sa'i sha thur ma la bskyon te
T13D4312-2:320a-46: bsregs pa bskams shing gsher bag med par byas pa'am
T13D4312-2:320a-47: / yang na lcags dang gsur zhing g-yos pa'i btung
T13D4312-2:320a-48: ba 'di nyid kyi 'og nas bshad pa yin no
T13D4312-2:320a-49: / // rgun chang chang rnying mnan chang rnying //
T13D4312-2:320a-50: rgun chu bskol ba las byung blud //
T13D4312-2:320b-0: yang @320b rgun chang dang chang rnying pa dang sman
T13D4312-2:320b-1: la sogs pa'i khu ba yun ring du mnan pa'i
T13D4312-2:320b-2: chang yang phan no de dag kyang rnying pa kho
T13D4312-2:320b-3: na phan no // yang na chu bskol ba las gyur pa'i rgun chad blud na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:320b-4: aa sa na sogs bskol ba'i chu //
T13D4312-2:320b-5: 'jag ma bskol chu sbrang rtsi'i chu //
T13D4312-2:320b-7: aa na la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i chu 'am /
T13D4312-2:320b-8: 'jag ma'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i chu'am /
T13D4312-2:320b-9: sbrang rtsi'i chu blud na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:320b-10: 'bras bu gsum la mtshan mo sbangs //
T13D4312-2:320b-11: nyin pang bskams la de nas ni //
T13D4312-2:320b-12: legs bar btags pa'i phye dag dang //
T13D4312-2:320b-13: bur chang sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud //
T13D4312-2:320b-15: yang na nas kyi nang du 'bras bu gsum bskol
T13D4312-2:320b-16: la chu de mtshan gcig bzhag nas de spangs la
T13D4312-2:320b-17: nyin par bskams te legs par phyer byas te bur
T13D4312-2:320b-18: ma chang sbrang rtsir btsos te blud na yang phan
T13D4312-2:320b-19: no // s'a la lo ma bdun pa dang //
T13D4312-2:320b-20: kam bi lya dang ba ru ra //
T13D4312-2:320b-21: bri ksha ka dang ka pid tha //
T13D4312-2:320b-22: ro hi ni yi me tog ni //
T13D4312-2:320b-23: phyer btags sbrang rtsir bcas sbyin nam //
T13D4312-2:320b-24: skyu ru ra yi khu ba blud //
T13D4312-2:320b-25: bad kan mkhris pa'i gcin nad sel //
T13D4312-2:320b-27: sa la sogs pa las skyes pa'i me tog phyer btags pa sbrang rtsi dang bcas par sbyin pa'am /
T13D4312-2:320b-28: yang na skyu ru ra'i khu ba'i nang du s'a
T13D4312-2:320b-29: la la sogs pa'i me tog btab ste blud na
T13D4312-2:320b-30: bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi
T13D4312-2:320b-32: gze ma skyer pa seng phrom dang //
T13D4312-2:320b-33: shu dag kad pa la aa rdzun //
T13D4312-2:320b-34: shug pa lung thang aa sman ta //
T13D4312-2:320b-35: tsandan dang ni aa ka ru //
T13D4312-2:320b-36: la la phud dang ba to la //
T13D4312-2:320b-37: ga dur bong nga go bye btsod //
T13D4312-2:320b-38: bad kan rlung la til mar bcas //
T13D4312-2:320b-39: mkhris par mar de 'dren mar btsos //
T13D4312-2:320b-41: gze ma la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang /
T13D4312-2:320b-42: til mar bskol ba blud na rlung dang bad kan las gyur ba'i gcin nad sel to //
T13D4312-2:320b-43: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i gcin nad la ni sman
T13D4312-2:320b-44: 'di dag nyid mar du btsos pa sbyin par bya'o
T13D4312-2:320b-45: // nad gzhi gsum char 'dres pa la ni sman
T13D4312-2:320b-46: de dag mar dang til mar 'dres mar btsos te
T13D4312-2:320b-47: // blud par bya'o // rtsa ba bcu pa zir dkar //
T13D4312-2:320b-48: dan ti thang shing ba spru gnyis //
T13D4312-2:320b-49: snu ha aarka'i rtsa ba dang //
T13D4312-2:320b-50: bhu ka'i dam pa aa ru ra //
T13D4312-2:320b-51: go bye ka ranydza'i rtsa ba //
T13D4312-2:320b-52: ba ran yi rtsa ba dang //
T13D4312-2:320b-53: pi pi ling rtsa ma nu'i rtsa //
T13D4312-2:321a-2: nas dang rgya sran rgya shug las //
T13D4312-2:321a-3: bre gsum chu ni brgyad 'gyur dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-4: bskol la bzhi cha lus pa dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-5: de dag pi pi ling gnyis dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-6: dbyi mo lcang ma ro hi sha //
T13D4312-2:321a-7: dur byid byi dang kam bi lya //
T13D4312-2:321a-8: ga bra'i rtsa ba bca' sga dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-9: mar bre gang du bskol ba yis //
T13D4312-2:321a-10: gcin snyi'i nad ni de nyid dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-11: 'brum phran dug dang skya rbab dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-13: 'or nad skem dang dbyig dug dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-14: dmu rdzing lud pa dbugs mi bde //
T13D4312-2:321a-15: slon dang tshil ches mcher ba'i nad //
T13D4312-2:321a-16: dreg mdze smyo byed brjed byed 'joms //
T13D4312-2:321a-19: rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa'i sman sna re
T13D4312-2:321a-20: re zhing srang bcu bcu nas sogs pa gsum las
T13D4312-2:321a-21: bre re re de thams cad kyi chu brgyad 'gyur
T13D4312-2:321a-22: dang bskol la de las bzhi cha lus pa'i sman
T13D4312-2:321a-23: gyi khu ba'i nang du pi pi ling rnam gnyis
T13D4312-2:321a-24: la sogs pa'i lde gu dang bcas pa'i mar bre
T13D4312-2:321a-26: mar de blud na ni gcin snyi ba'i nad de
T13D4312-2:321a-27: dag thams cad dang 'brum pa la sogs pa'i nad
T13D4312-2:321a-29: mar 'di ni drang srong chen po thang la 'bar gyis bshad pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:321a-30: snu ha dang ka ranydza la sogs pa'i ni rtsa ba gzhug par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:321a-31: seng phrom mur ba byi dang ka /
T13D4312-2:321a-32: zur pa rgya spos ga bra'i rtsa //
T13D4312-2:321a-33: chu srin sen mo dug mo yungs //
T13D4312-2:321a-34: gla ba ru rta pri yang ku //
T13D4312-2:321a-35: gla gor zho sha tsi tra ka / bong nga bi sha la gnyis dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-36: dri bzang bzhi dang rtsa mkhris dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-37: pu shel tse dang la la phud //
T13D4312-2:321a-38: pa ta pushkar m'u la dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-39: pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-40: dbyi mo dang ni 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-2:321a-41: zho ni gnyis gnyis chu bre ni //
T13D4312-2:321a-42: bcu drug la bskol bzhi cha lus //
T13D4312-2:321a-43: btsags te bsgrangs pa'i nang du ni //
T13D4312-2:321a-44: sbrang rtsi bre do bcug nas ni //
T13D4312-2:321a-45: zla phyed legs par bzhag pa yi //
T13D4312-2:321a-46: seng phrom mnan chang gcin snyi dang //
T13D4312-2:321a-48: srin bu skya rbab pho ba'i nad //
T13D4312-2:321a-49: tshil ches pa yi nad sel byed //
T13D4312-2:321a-51: seng phrom la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zhing
T13D4312-2:321a-52: zho gnyis gnyis chu bre bcu drug gi nang du
T13D4312-2:321a-53: bskol la de las bzhi cha lus pa dang de
T13D4312-2:321a-54: tshags kyis btsags la bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi
T13D4312-2:321a-55: bre do bcug nas mar bcug pa'i snod du zla
T13D4312-2:321b-0: @321b ba phyed kyi bar du legs par mnan nas
T13D4312-2:321b-1: bzhag pa 'di ni seng phrom gyi mnan chang aa
T13D4312-2:321b-2: sa ba zhes bya ba yin te /
T13D4312-2:321b-3: de las ran par 'thungs na gcin snyi ba la sogs pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-2:321b-4: aa sa na la sogs pa'i sde //
T13D4312-2:321b-5: sna re srang ni nyi shu dag / chu bre nyis brgya lnga bcu drug /
T13D4312-2:321b-6: bskol ba bzhi cha lus pa dang //
T13D4312-2:321b-7: bu ram srang ni nyis brgya dang //
T13D4312-2:321b-8: sbrang rtsi bre do gzhug pa dang //
T13D4312-2:321b-9: dug mo yungs sogs lde gu ni //
T13D4312-2:321b-10: srang re'i tshad ni bcug pa ste //
T13D4312-2:321b-11: sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gi phye //
T13D4312-2:321b-12: mar gyis bskus pa'i snod dag ni //
T13D4312-2:321b-13: rgya skyegs bskus par bcug nas ni //
T13D4312-2:321b-14: nas kyi nang du bcug nas su //
T13D4312-2:321b-15: lcags ni rno la srab pa dag / seng ldeng gi ni me mdag bsregs //
T13D4312-2:321b-16: ji srid lcags ni zad pa'i bar //
T13D4312-2:321b-17: mang du der ni gzhug par bya //
T13D4312-2:321b-18: lcags las byas pa'i chang mnan blud //
T13D4312-2:321b-19: sngon pas yon tan lhag pa yin //
T13D4312-2:321b-21: aa sa na la sogs pa'i sman sna re re
T13D4312-2:321b-22: zhing srang nyi shu nyi shur byas pa chu bre
T13D4312-2:321b-23: ni brgyad la srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug
T13D4312-2:321b-24: yod de de'i nang du bskol ba nas rgya skyegs
T13D4312-2:321b-25: bskus shing byugs pa'i snod kyi nang du bzhag pa'i
T13D4312-2:321b-26: bar du byas la de ltar lcags rnon po las
T13D4312-2:321b-27: brdungs pa'i spyad srab mo leb leb mor byas la
T13D4312-2:321b-28: seng ldeng gi me mdag gis bsregs pa de'i bar
T13D4312-2:321b-29: du lcags zad kyi bar du bcug la zla ba
T13D4312-2:321b-30: gsum mam bzhi'i nang du mnan nas de lta bu'i
T13D4312-2:321b-31: chang blud na mnan chang de ni sngar gyi seng
T13D4312-2:321b-32: phrom gyi mnan pa'i chang bas yon tan ches lhag
T13D4312-2:321b-33: pa yin no // rtsub pa dril phyis dam du bsdams //
T13D4312-2:321b-34: drag shul mtshan mo gnyid mi log / tshil dang bad kan 'joms byed gang //
T13D4312-2:321b-35: de ni phyi nang las btang phan //
T13D4312-2:321b-37: yang gcin snyi ba'i nad de la lde gu rtsub pas lus dril zhing phyis pa dang /
T13D4312-2:321b-39: lus ngal zhing dub pa'i drag shul gyi tshad dang /
T13D4312-2:321b-40: mtshan mo nyal zhing gnyid ma log pa dang /
T13D4312-2:321b-41: gzhan yang bad kan dang tshil 'joms shing dbri bar byed pa'i kha zas dang /
T13D4312-2:321b-42: spyod lam la sogs pa phyi dang nang nas bsten pa ste /
T13D4312-2:321b-43: de thams cad la phan pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:321b-44: brag zhun srang brgya snying po'i chu //
T13D4312-2:321b-45: spangs pa snying po'i chu dang ni //
T13D4312-2:321b-46: legs par blud cing s'a lu dang //
T13D4312-2:322a-0: @322a * // skam sa'i sha khur bcas pa bza' //
T13D4312-2:322a-1: bla brnan shin tu mang ba yi //
T13D4312-2:322a-2: gcin snyi'i nad ni kun kyang 'joms //
T13D4312-2:322a-3: 'bras phreng thor bu rmen bu dang //
T13D4312-2:322a-4: tshil ches mdze dang mtshan bar rdol //
T13D4312-2:322a-5: srin nad rkang bam 'or nad sel //
T13D4312-2:322a-6: 'di ni bcud kyis len mchog yin ;
T13D4312-2:322a-8: aa sa na la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan
T13D4312-2:322a-9: bskol ba'i chu'i nang du brag zhun bzang po srang
T13D4312-2:322a-10: brgya legs par spangs la bcud kyis len gyi cho
T13D4312-2:322a-11: ga'i tshul du snying po'i chu nyid dang blud la
T13D4312-2:322a-12: s'a lu'i 'bras chan dang skam sa'i sha khu dang
T13D4312-2:322a-13: bcas pa bza' bar byin na bla brnan gyi nad
T13D4312-2:322a-14: shin tu mang po dang ldan pa yang 'joms par
T13D4312-2:322a-15: byed cing 'bras kyi phreng ba la sogs pa yang
T13D4312-2:322a-17: 'di ni bcud kyis len rnams kyi mchog yin no //
T13D4312-2:322a-18: lam du dugs dang lham dag ni //
T13D4312-2:322a-19: med par drang srong tshul du ni //
T13D4312-2:322a-20: dpag tshad brgya yi bar du 'gro / chu yi gnas ni brko pa'am //
T13D4312-2:322a-21: ba gcin lci ba bsten pa'am //
T13D4312-2:322a-22: ba lang dang ni lhan cig 'khyams //
T13D4312-2:322a-24: yang gcin nad can gyi mis dugs dang lham la
T13D4312-2:322a-25: sogs pa med par gnas shing drang srong dag gi
T13D4312-2:322a-26: tshul du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu tsam za ba
T13D4312-2:322a-27: dang dpag tshad brgya'i bar du 'gro bar bya ba
T13D4312-2:322a-28: dang / de bzhin du chu'i gnas khron pa la
T13D4312-2:322a-29: sogs pa brko bas lus dub ba'am yang na ba
T13D4312-2:322a-30: gcin 'thungs shing lci ba za ba'am /
T13D4312-2:322a-31: ba lang dang lhan cig 'khyams shing 'gro bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:322a-32: skem pa'i gcin nad dag la ni //
T13D4312-2:322a-33: zas dang sman tshil mi bskyed pas //
T13D4312-2:322a-35: gcin nad can skem po dag tshil mi skye zhing
T13D4312-2:322a-36: nad pa'i kha zas dang grol sogs pas brta bar
T13D4312-2:322a-37: bya'o // kham phor la sogs 'bras nad ni //
T13D4312-2:322a-38: ma smin skrang pa'i nad ltar gso //
T13D4312-2:322a-39: smin pa la ni rma ltar gso //
T13D4312-2:322a-41: kham phor zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bras kyi
T13D4312-2:322a-42: nad bcu po ma smin pa dag ni skrang ba'i
T13D4312-2:322a-43: nad ltar gso bar bya la smin pa la ni
T13D4312-2:322a-44: rma ji ltar gso ba de ltar gso bar bya'o
T13D4312-2:322a-45: // de yi sngon byung tshul nyid la //
T13D4312-2:322a-46: 'o ma can shing bskol chu dang //
T13D4312-2:322a-47: ra thug gcin ni blud pa bsngags //
T13D4312-2:322a-48: gcin snyi'i nad can lto sra bas //
T13D4312-2:322a-49: phal cher bkru sman rnon po gtang //
T13D4312-2:322b-1: thor bu la sogs pa 'bras nad 'di dag sngar
T13D4312-2:322b-2: byung ba'i tshul ji skad byung ba'i tshe na 'o
T13D4312-2:322b-3: ma can gyi shing bskol ba'i chu dang ra thug
T13D4312-2:322b-4: gi gcin blud pa bsngags so //
T13D4312-2:322b-5: gzhan yang bkru sman rnon po gtang bar bya ste /
T13D4312-2:322b-7: gcin nad can ni phal cher lto sra ba'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-2:322b-8: sug smel sogs kyi til mar sbyar //
T13D4312-2:322b-9: rma 'tshob pa yi cho ga bya //
T13D4312-2:322b-11: yang na sug smel la sogs pa'i sde tshan skyug
T13D4312-2:322b-12: sman la sogs pa'i sde'i skabs nas bshad pa dang
T13D4312-2:322b-13: / til mar bskol bas rma 'tshob ba dang 'byor ba'i cho ga bya'o //
T13D4312-2:322b-14: dong gra la sogs sde tshan ni //
T13D4312-2:322b-15: btags pa'i lde gus dril bar bya //
T13D4312-2:322b-17: yang na dong gra la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis dril bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:322b-18: aa sa na sogs bskol chu blud //
T13D4312-2:322b-19: dug mo yungs sogs zas skom sbyar //
T13D4312-2:322b-21: sman gyi chu blud pa ni /
T13D4312-2:322b-22: aa sa na la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol bas bya la /
T13D4312-2:322b-23: zas dang skom gyi sbyor ba'i nang du dug mo
T13D4312-2:322b-24: yungs la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang sbyar te sbyin
T13D4312-2:322b-25: par bya'o // pa ta thal tres tsi tra ka / sha rang ka ta kan ta ri //
T13D4312-2:322b-27: kad pa la dang dong ga'i phye //
T13D4312-2:322b-28: sbrang rtsis lde gur bya ba'am //
T13D4312-2:322b-29: lcags dgu pa yang de bzhin sbyin //
T13D4312-2:322b-31: pa ta dang thal tres zhes bya ba sha rang
T13D4312-2:322b-32: la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma zhib tu btags
T13D4312-2:322b-33: te sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba lde gur bya ba'am
T13D4312-2:322b-34: lcags dgu ba'i sbyor bskya rbab gso ba'i skabs nas
T13D4312-2:322b-35: bshad pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu yang
T13D4312-2:322b-36: de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:322b-37: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13D4312-2:322b-38: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las /
T13D4312-2:322b-39: gso ba'i gnas le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13D4312-2:322b-41: // / de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs kyi nang gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:322b-43: go rims gyis na le'u 'di brtsams pa yin te /
T13D4312-2:322b-44: kham bor lta bu la sogs pa'i 'bras kyi nad
T13D4312-2:322b-45: ni gso sla bas le'u snga mar bshad pa yin
T13D4312-2:322b-46: la / 'di ni gso dka' bas 'di'i skabs su brtsams pa yin no //
T13D4312-2:322b-47: khong 'bras ma smin thams cad la //
T13D4312-2:322b-48: 'or nad lta bur gso ba dang //
T13D4312-2:323a-3: khong 'bras kyi nad ma smin pa thams cad la
T13D4312-2:323a-4: ni 'or nad ji lta ba bzhin gso zhing nad
T13D4312-2:323a-5: gzhi ji lta ba las rtag par khrag rgyun du
T13D4312-2:323a-6: dbyung zhing gtar ga'i las bya'o //
T13D4312-2:323a-7: smin pa la ni rma ltar gso //
T13D4312-2:323a-9: khong 'bras de smin nas ni dbral la rma'i gso ba ji lta ba bzhin du gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:323a-10: rlung shas che la rtsa ba lnga //
T13D4312-2:323a-11: bskol bas rma ni bkru ba dang /
T13D4312-2:323a-12: thang shing sogs sde shing mngar dang //
T13D4312-2:323a-13: til sbyar rgyam tshas rma bsku bya //
T13D4312-2:323a-15: khong 'bras kyi rma rlung shas che ba la ni
T13D4312-2:323a-16: rtsa ba lnga bskol ba'i chus dang por bkru zhing
T13D4312-2:323a-17: sbyar ba dang / thang shing la sogs pa'i sman
T13D4312-2:323a-18: sde dang shing mngar dang til gyi lde gu la
T13D4312-2:323a-19: rgyam tsha bsres pas rma bsku bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:323a-20: bkru sman dang ni ldan pa yi //
T13D4312-2:323a-21: dur byid kyis ni rnam sbyangs shing //
T13D4312-2:323a-22: bi da ri yi sde bskol ba'i //
T13D4312-2:323a-23: dur byid nyid kyis rma sbyor bya //
T13D4312-2:323a-25: bkru sman gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i dur byid dang
T13D4312-2:323a-26: zhun mar dang tshil dang rkang dang bcas pas sbyang
T13D4312-2:323a-27: zhing dag par byas la bi da ri'i sman gyi
T13D4312-2:323a-28: sde tshan dang bskol ba'i dur byid de nyid kyis
T13D4312-2:323a-30: mkhris gyur 'o ma can chus bkru //
T13D4312-2:323a-31: sle tres shing mngar til gyis bsku //
T13D4312-2:323a-33: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khong 'bras kyi rma la
T13D4312-2:323a-34: ni n+ya gro dha la sogs pa 'o ma can
T13D4312-2:323a-35: gyi shing bskol ba'i chus bkru zhing de'i 'og tu
T13D4312-2:323a-36: sle tres la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o
T13D4312-2:323a-37: // btsod dang rgya shug pu shel tsi //
T13D4312-2:323a-38: pa ya sya dang ser po gnyis //
T13D4312-2:323a-39: 'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar dang //
T13D4312-2:323a-42: yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma de la btsod
T13D4312-2:323a-43: la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mar gyis kyang bskus
T13D4312-2:323a-45: yang na n+ya gro dha sogs pa'i //
T13D4312-2:323a-46: myu gu shun pa 'bras bu bsku //
T13D4312-2:323a-48: yang na n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i sde tshan
T13D4312-2:323a-49: gyi myu gu dang shun lpags dang 'bras bu dang
T13D4312-2:323a-50: mar du bskol bas bsku zhing 'byor par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:323a-51: bad kan las gyur dong ga'i chus //
T13D4312-2:323a-52: bkru zhing phye dang ser po gnyis //
T13D4312-2:323a-53: dur byid dang ni til gyis bsku //
T13D4312-2:323a-55: bad kan las gyur pa'i rma la ni /
T13D4312-2:323b-0: @323b dong ga la sogs pa'i chus bkru zhing 'khrugs
T13D4312-2:323b-1: pa dang nas phye dang ser po gnyis la sogs
T13D4312-2:323b-2: pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:323b-3: yang na rgya sran dan ti yi //
T13D4312-2:323b-4: sha ma dur byid tsi tra ka / seng phrom rgyam tsha ba gcin bcas //
T13D4312-2:323b-5: til mar gyis ni rma 'tsho ba bya //
T13D4312-2:323b-7: yang na rgya sran ku langtha zhes bya ba la
T13D4312-2:323b-8: sogs pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i til mar gyis bskus
T13D4312-2:323b-10: khrag dang glo bur las gyur pa //
T13D4312-2:323b-11: mkhris pa'i khong 'bras lta bur gso //
T13D4312-2:323b-14: glo bur du snad par gyur ba'i khong 'bras la
T13D4312-2:323b-15: ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khong 'bras dang mthun
T13D4312-2:323b-17: ma smin nad du byung ba la //
T13D4312-2:323b-18: ba ra na sogs sde bskol bar //
T13D4312-2:323b-19: au sha ka yi sde tshan btab //
T13D4312-2:323b-20: snga dro khong 'bras can la blud //
T13D4312-2:323b-22: khong 'bras nang du byung zhing smin par ma gyur
T13D4312-2:323b-23: pa la ni ba ra na la sogs pa'i sde
T13D4312-2:323b-24: tshan bskol ba'i nang du au sha ka la sogs
T13D4312-2:323b-25: pa'i sde tshan gyi phye ma btab pa snga dro
T13D4312-2:323b-26: bad kan gyi dus su blud na phan no //
T13D4312-2:323b-27: bkru sman bcas par bskol ba'i mar //
T13D4312-2:323b-28: de gnyis dang ni ldan par blud //
T13D4312-2:323b-30: bkru sman gyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i mar ba
T13D4312-2:323b-31: ra na se'i sde tshan dang au sha ka'i sde
T13D4312-2:323b-32: tshan de gnyis dang ldan par blud cing sbyin par
T13D4312-2:323b-33: bya'o // ni ru ha dang snum 'jam rtsi //
T13D4312-2:323b-34: de dag gnyis la sbyar bar bya //
T13D4312-2:323b-36: yang ma smin zhing nang du byung ba'i khong 'bras
T13D4312-2:323b-37: la ni ru ha dang snum gyi 'jam rtsi mas
T13D4312-2:323b-38: gtong ba ba ra na dang au sha ka'i sde
T13D4312-2:323b-39: tshan de gnyis dang sbyar ba yang nad dmigs ji
T13D4312-2:323b-40: lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o ;
T13D4312-2:323b-41: / bza' dang btung dang bsku ba la //
T13D4312-2:323b-42: sbrang rtsi na le sha ma dkar sbyar //
T13D4312-2:323b-43: nad dmigs ji bzhin blud na ni //
T13D4312-2:323b-46: sbrang rtsi la sogs pa'i bza' btung la sogs pa btang na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:323b-47: kyi lce nim pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-2:323b-48: shing mngar bu tse shel cha mnyam //
T13D4312-2:323b-49: dur byid pa to la'i rtsa ba //
T13D4312-2:323b-50: re re cha ni bzhi bar bya //
T13D4312-2:323b-51: sran chung sbun ba med srang brgyad //
T13D4312-2:323b-52: de bskol mar dang bcas ba blud //
T13D4312-2:323b-53: khong 'bras skran dang me dpal dang //
T13D4312-2:323b-54: lus tsha rmongs bag myos rims 'debs //
T13D4312-2:324a-1: brgya la slon snying nad dang //
T13D4312-2:324a-2: khrag mkhris mig ser mdze nad sel //
T13D4312-2:324a-4: kyi lce ba la sogs pa cha mnyam par byas
T13D4312-2:324a-5: la dur byid la sogs pa rdzas snga ma dang
T13D4312-2:324a-6: po'i cha las dpags te re re zhing bzhi cha
T13D4312-2:324a-7: bzhi char byas pa la sran chung snum dang shun
T13D4312-2:324a-8: pa med pa las srang brgyad bcug ste /
T13D4312-2:324a-9: de rnams bskol ba mar dang bsres ba blud na
T13D4312-2:324a-10: yang khong 'bras la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed
T13D4312-2:324a-11: do // gzhung rtsom par byed pa pos sbyor ba 'di nyid bsdus pa las gzhan du bshad de /
T13D4312-2:324a-12: 'bras bu gsum dang nim pa dang /
T13D4312-2:324a-13: shing mngar dang pu shel tse dang pa to la
T13D4312-2:324a-14: zho phyed phyed dur byid dang kyi lce ba zho
T13D4312-2:324a-15: gnyis sran chung srang gcig chu brgyad 'gyur gyi nang
T13D4312-2:324a-16: du bskol la btsags pa'i khu ba mar gyis btab
T13D4312-2:324a-19: kyi lce ba ni phul gang dag / brgyad 'gyur chu dang bskol ba ni //
T13D4312-2:324a-20: de yi khu ba phul gang dang //
T13D4312-2:324a-21: skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang ;
T13D4312-2:324a-22: /'o ma mar ni phul re dang //
T13D4312-2:324a-23: tig ta byi tsher kra yan ti //
T13D4312-2:324a-24: gla sgang ra ma nye ta ma la //
T13D4312-2:324a-26: gcig tu bsdus te bskol ba yi //
T13D4312-2:324a-27: mar de yon tan snga mar mtshungs //
T13D4312-2:324a-29: kyi lce ba phul gang zhes bya ba srang bzhi
T13D4312-2:324a-30: chu phul brgyad kyi nang du bskol la kyi lce
T13D4312-2:324a-31: ba'i khu ba phul gang zhes smos kyang gsher ba'i
T13D4312-2:324a-32: rdzas 'dab tu lci dgos pas phul do skyu ru
T13D4312-2:324a-33: ra la sogs pa'i khu ba yang brgyad brgyad du
T13D4312-2:324a-34: byas te / de'i nang du tig ta la sogs
T13D4312-2:324a-35: pa zho gnyis gnyis te de thams cad gcig tu
T13D4312-2:324a-36: bsdus nas bskol ba'i sman mar de ni bshad ma
T13D4312-2:324a-37: thag pa'i khu ba snga ma dang yon tan mtshungs
T13D4312-2:324a-38: byas te / pa yin no // rgun 'bru 'bra
T13D4312-2:324a-39: go ma du ka / bi da ri dang nye'u
T13D4312-2:324a-40: byas te / pa yin no // shing bcas // ba ru sha ka 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-2:324a-41: de btsos khu ba mar bskol la //
T13D4312-2:324a-42: 'o ma bu ram shing khu dang //
T13D4312-2:324a-43: skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang //
T13D4312-2:324a-44: aa ru ra yi lde gur bcas //
T13D4312-2:324a-45: bskol te bsgrangs pa de'i nang du ;
T13D4312-2:324a-46: / kha ra sbrang rtsi bzhi cha btab //
T13D4312-2:324a-47: yon tan snga ma 'drar shes bya //
T13D4312-2:324a-49: rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba dang /
T13D4312-2:324a-50: 'o ma bu ram shing gi khu ba dang /
T13D4312-2:324a-51: skyu ru ra'i khu ba cha mnyam par byas pa'i
T13D4312-2:324a-52: nang du aa ru ra'i lde gu bcug ste bsgrangs
T13D4312-2:324b-0: pa'i nang du kha ra dang sbrang rtsi de'i @324b
T13D4312-2:324b-1: bzhi cha btab ste blud na yang kyi lce ba
T13D4312-2:324b-2: la sogs pa'i yon tan ji skad smos pa dang
T13D4312-2:324b-4: nad dmigs ji bzhin rngabs rva sogs //
T13D4312-2:324b-5: yang na gtar gas khrag dbyung bya //
T13D4312-2:324b-7: yang na nang gi zug rngu'i nad ji lta ba
T13D4312-2:324b-8: las rngabs rva dang bsku ba dang pad pa la
T13D4312-2:324b-10: yang gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:324b-11: khong 'bras smin par gyur pa la //
T13D4312-2:324b-12: khong par gnas pa phyir 'bur bar //
T13D4312-2:324b-13: shes nas de ni bcing bar bya //
T13D4312-2:324b-15: khong 'bras smin cing rnam par gyur na khong bar gnas pa de phyir 'bur bar 'gyur te /
T13D4312-2:324b-16: de ltar shes nas de legs par bcing bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:324b-17: gzer ba der gnas gong bur 'dug / de ngos btsir bas tshor ba chung //
T13D4312-2:324b-18: tsha ba la sogs chung gyur na //
T13D4312-2:324b-19: smin pa yin pas khong 'bras ni //
T13D4312-2:324b-20: brtol te rma ltar gso bar bya //
T13D4312-2:324b-22: gzer ba de nyid du gnas gong bu'i tshul du
T13D4312-2:324b-23: gnas pa snyam byed na de'i ngos nas rim gyis
T13D4312-2:324b-24: btsir bas tshor ba chung zhing bem bem por 'gyur
T13D4312-2:324b-25: ba de bzhin du tsha ba la sogs pa yang
T13D4312-2:324b-27: khong 'bras de chung ba yin pas gtsags spyad gdab
T13D4312-2:324b-28: pa'i skabs nas smos pa smin pa'i mtshan nyid lta
T13D4312-2:324b-29: bus smin pa yin na de brtol te rma gso
T13D4312-2:324b-30: ba'i tshul du gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:324b-31: nang gi char gnas khong 'bras ni //
T13D4312-2:324b-32: smin pa'i mtshan ma'ang 'di nyid yin //
T13D4312-2:324b-33: smin nas bu ga rnag gyur te //
T13D4312-2:324b-34: de ni steng ma 'og tu dbyung //
T13D4312-2:324b-36: khong pa'i cha la gnas pa'i khong 'bras la yang mtshan ma 'di dag nyid 'byung ba yin la /
T13D4312-2:324b-37: de ni smin nas bu ga'i nang du rnags par gyur te /
T13D4312-2:324b-38: sting gi sgo'am 'og gi sgo nas dbyung ngo //
T13D4312-2:324b-39: rang nyid rdol ba'i nad de ni //
T13D4312-2:324b-40: zas phan byin zhing btang snyoms bzhag / zhag bcu'am bcu gnyis bar du ni //
T13D4312-2:324b-41: sman pas bla brnan las bsrung bya //
T13D4312-2:324b-43: rnag ces bya ba'i nad de gso ba ma byas par rang nyid smin cing rdol bar gyur na /
T13D4312-2:324b-44: rma de la phan pa'i zas tsam byin nas nad
T13D4312-2:324b-45: pa de re zhig mi bcos par btang snyoms su
T13D4312-2:324b-46: bzhag cing zhag bcu'i bar ram bcu gnyis kyi bar
T13D4312-2:325a-0: @325a * // du bla brnan gyi nad mi 'byung bar sman pas legs par bsrung bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:325a-1: rnag ni legs par mi 'dzag na //
T13D4312-2:325a-2: ba ra na sogs chu dron nam //
T13D4312-2:325a-3: shi kru sbrang rtsi blud pa'am //
T13D4312-2:325a-4: de dang sbyar ba'i nas thug blud //
T13D4312-2:325a-6: rnag ces bya ba'i nad legs par 'dzag par ma gyur na /
T13D4312-2:325a-7: de 'dzag par bya ba'i phyir bar na la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan nam /
T13D4312-2:325a-8: shi kru dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nas thug blud par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:325a-9: rgya shug rgya sran nas kyi ni //
T13D4312-2:325a-10: yu sha dang ni bza' ba bsngags //
T13D4312-2:325a-12: rgya shugs la sogs pa las byas pa'i yu sha
T13D4312-2:325a-13: dang bza' ba byin na yang bsngags pa yin no
T13D4312-2:325a-14: // zhag bcu yan chad kyi lce ba //
T13D4312-2:325a-15: mar ram seng phrom dag gis ni //
T13D4312-2:325a-16: nyams stobs ji bzhin sbyang bar bya //
T13D4312-2:325a-17: sbyangs nas tig ta sbrang rtsi blud //
T13D4312-2:325a-19: zhag bcu lon pa yan chad kyi kyi lce ba'i
T13D4312-2:325a-20: mar 'di nyid las bstan pa dang seng phrom gyi
T13D4312-2:325a-21: mar rlung nad gso ba'i skabs nas bshad pa dag
T13D4312-2:325a-22: gis de sbyang zhing dag par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:325a-23: de ltar sbyangs pa'i las byas zin nas tig ta'i
T13D4312-2:325a-24: sman mar sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa nyung zad nyung
T13D4312-2:325a-26: 'di la kun kyang skran lta bur //
T13D4312-2:325a-27: nad thabs ji bzhin gso bar bya //
T13D4312-2:325a-29: khong 'bras kyi nad 'di la skran ji ltar gso
T13D4312-2:325a-30: ba bzhin du nad kyi dmigs dang sbyar te gso
T13D4312-2:325a-31: bar bya'o // khong 'bras kun dang gnas skabs dang //
T13D4312-2:325a-32: thams cad du ni gu gul dang //
T13D4312-2:325a-33: de bzhin brag zhun rang rang gi //
T13D4312-2:325a-34: sbyor bar bcas te khu ba blud //
T13D4312-2:325a-36: khong 'bras kyi nad thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du smin pa dang /
T13D4312-2:325a-37: ma smin pa dang rma'i gnas skabs thams cad du
T13D4312-2:325a-38: rang rang gi sbyor ba 'di ni smos pa dang
T13D4312-2:325a-39: ma smos pa dag dang sbyar ba'i gu gul bskol
T13D4312-2:325a-41: de bzhin du rang rang gi sbyor ba dang ci
T13D4312-2:325a-42: rigs par sbyar ba'i brag zhun dag btang zhing sbyin
T13D4312-2:325a-43: par bya'o // 'bad de smin pa las bsrung bya //
T13D4312-2:325a-44: smin na shin tu gso dka' yin //
T13D4312-2:325a-46: khong 'bras kyi nad ni ci nas kyang smin cing
T13D4312-2:325a-47: rnag par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul du bsrung zhing gso
T13D4312-2:325b-1: gang ga phyir khong 'bras nang du smin par gyur
T13D4312-2:325b-2: pa ni shin tu gso ba dka' ba yin te
T13D4312-2:325b-3: de bsod nams kyi dbang las 'tsho bar 'gyur ba
T13D4312-2:325b-5: gzhan yang myur du tsha byed pas //
T13D4312-2:325b-6: khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad //
T13D4312-2:325b-8: myur du tsha zhing smin par byed pa'i phyir nad
T13D4312-2:325b-9: de la ming khong 'bras zhes bya ba yin par
T13D4312-2:325b-10: bstan no // gal te gcin snyi las gyur na //
T13D4312-2:325b-11: gcin snyi ba yi gso ba bya //
T13D4312-2:325b-13: khong 'bras kyi nyes pa de gcin snyi ba'i za
T13D4312-2:325b-14: gu'i nad las gyur pa yin na de la ni
T13D4312-2:325b-15: gcin nad za gu'i gso ba gang yin pa yang
T13D4312-2:325b-16: bya'o // nu mar byung la 'di ltar ni //
T13D4312-2:325b-17: mi bcing thams cad rma ltar gso //
T13D4312-2:325b-19: nu mar khong 'bras byung ba la ni 'di ltar
T13D4312-2:325b-20: bcing ba'i sbyor ba ji skad smras pa mi bya
T13D4312-2:325b-22: btung ba dang spyod lam la sogs pa thams cad rma'i tshul du gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:325b-23: gal te de bcings shing dkris par gyur na de'i
T13D4312-2:325b-24: sha shin tu 'jam pa thams cad rnags nas zhig
T13D4312-2:325b-25: par 'gyur ro // dbral tshe nu zho 'dzag pa dang //
T13D4312-2:325b-26: nu sor nag por mi gnod bsrung //
T13D4312-2:325b-28: nu ma'i nu 'bras de smin par gyur na gtsags
T13D4312-2:325b-29: bu'i las byas shing dbral bar bya la dbral ba
T13D4312-2:325b-30: de'i tshe na nu zho 'dzag pa'i rtsa dang nu
T13D4312-2:325b-31: sor nag po'am de'i nye 'khor nag til til por
T13D4312-2:325b-32: 'dug pa de la mi gnod cing ma phog par
T13D4312-2:325b-33: bsrungs la gtsags bus gdab par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:325b-34: ma smin gnas skabs thams cad du //
T13D4312-2:325b-35: de yi nu zho btsir zhing bzho //
T13D4312-2:325b-37: ma smin pa dang smin pa dang phyed smin pa'i
T13D4312-2:325b-38: gnas skabs thams cad du de'i nu zho de btsir
T13D4312-2:325b-39: zhing ma lus par ba zho bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:325b-40: rgyu rlugs rlung shas che ba la //
T13D4312-2:325b-41: dur byid snum can gyis sbyang zhing //
T13D4312-2:325b-42: aa mra'i 'bras bu seng phrom mar //
T13D4312-2:325b-43: ae randa dang skyid de ba'i //
T13D4312-2:325b-44: mar dang sman mar 'dres ma sbyin //
T13D4312-2:325b-46: rlung las gyur pa'i rgyu rlugs kyi nad la ni
T13D4312-2:325b-47: nad pa dur byid snum dang ldan pas dugs byas
T13D4312-2:325b-48: la sbyang bar bya zhing aa mra'i 'bras bu'i mar
T13D4312-2:325b-49: dang seng phrom gyi mar dang /
T13D4312-2:325b-50: ae randa'i mar dang skyid de ba'i mar dang 'dren
T13D4312-2:325b-51: ma'i sman mar gang yang rung bas smin zhing bkru
T13D4312-2:326a-2: de nas rlung 'joms sman khu snum //
T13D4312-2:326a-3: lde gus mas gtong drag po bya //
T13D4312-2:326a-5: de ltar bkru sman drag po btang ba'i 'og tu
T13D4312-2:326a-6: des brtas la rlung 'joms pa'i sman gyi sde tshan
T13D4312-2:326a-7: gyi bkru sman drag po'i sman khu dang /
T13D4312-2:326a-8: snum dang lde gu'i bkru sman mas gtang ba drag po ni ru ha zhes bya ba bya'o //
T13D4312-2:326a-9: sha khur bcas pa'i zas sbyin zhing //
T13D4312-2:326a-10: shing mngar snum bskol 'jam rtsi btang //
T13D4312-2:326a-12: nad pa de de ltar ni ru ha zhes byas
T13D4312-2:326a-13: nas sha khu dang bcas pa'i zas byin na de'i
T13D4312-2:326a-14: 'og tu shing mngar dang til mar bskol ba'i 'jam
T13D4312-2:326a-16: rlung 'joms dugs dang bsku ba bya //
T13D4312-2:326a-17: smin nas dbral la rma ltar gso //
T13D4312-2:326a-19: de la rlung las gyur pa'i rgyu rlugs kyi nad
T13D4312-2:326a-20: la ni rlung 'joms shing sel ba'i dugs dang bsku
T13D4312-2:326a-22: de smin par gyur nas ni dbral la gso ba'i cho ga rma ltar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:326a-23: rgyu rlugs khrag mkhris las gyur pa //
T13D4312-2:326a-24: smin dang ma smin ji bzhin du //
T13D4312-2:326a-25: rma dang skrangs pa'i gso ba bya //
T13D4312-2:326a-26: rgyun du khrag kyang dbyung bar bya //
T13D4312-2:326a-28: khrag las gyur pa dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
T13D4312-2:326a-29: rgyu rlugs kyi nad la ni smin pa dang ma
T13D4312-2:326a-30: smin pa dag la rma dang skrangs pa'i gso ba
T13D4312-2:326a-31: bya ste / de yang go rims ji lta ba
T13D4312-2:326a-32: bzhin smin pa la ni rma'i tshul du gso la
T13D4312-2:326a-33: ma smin pa la ni skrangs pa'i tshul du gso
T13D4312-2:326a-34: bya ste / bar bya'o // yang na de la
T13D4312-2:326a-35: rtag par rgyun du khrag dbyung bar bya ba'i cho
T13D4312-2:326a-36: bya ste / bar bya'o // ga bya'o // bad kan las gyur skyer pa yi //
T13D4312-2:326a-37: phye ma ba gcin sbyar ba blud ;
T13D4312-2:326a-39: bad kan las gyur pa'i rgyu rlugs kyi nad la
T13D4312-2:326a-40: ni skyer ba'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba
T13D4312-2:326a-41: blud par bya'o // 'di la mnyed bya ma gtogs par //
T13D4312-2:326a-42: bad kan rmen bu'i gso ba bya //
T13D4312-2:326a-44: bad kan las gyur pa'i khong 'bras kyi nad 'di
T13D4312-2:326a-45: la ni de mnyed cing zhum par bya ba'i thabs
T13D4312-2:326a-46: ma gtogs pa bad kan gyi rmen bu gso ba'i
T13D4312-2:326a-48: smin nas dbral te dz'a ti yi //
T13D4312-2:326a-49: me tog go bye aang ko la //
T13D4312-2:326a-50: lo ma bdun pa pa to la //
T13D4312-2:326a-51: nim pa yung ba byi dang ga / dug mo yungs dang til mar bskol //
T13D4312-2:326a-52: rma sbyang phyir ni blud pa bsngags //
T13D4312-2:326b-1: bad kan las gyur pa'i rgyu rlugs smin par gyur
T13D4312-2:326b-2: pa la ni gtsags bus dbral la dz'a ti'i me
T13D4312-2:326b-3: tog la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i til mar blud
T13D4312-2:326b-5: dz'a ti'i me tog ni su ma na'o //
T13D4312-2:326b-6: go bye ni ba la ta ga'o //
T13D4312-2:326b-7: aang ko la ni air pa la'o //
T13D4312-2:326b-8: tshil las gyur la byi'u rug sogs //
T13D4312-2:326b-9: ba gcin sbyar te btags pa'am //
T13D4312-2:326b-10: mgo bo'i bkru sman dag gis bya //
T13D4312-2:326b-11: rlig pa'i srubs mtshams ma gtogs par //
T13D4312-2:326b-12: 'phel gtsags kyis ni dbral nas su //
T13D4312-2:326b-13: tshil ni legs par dbyung bar bya //
T13D4312-2:326b-14: rma ni sbrang rtsi nag tshur dang //
T13D4312-2:326b-15: rgyam tsha nges par bskus nas btsems //
T13D4312-2:326b-17: tshil las gyur pa'i rgyu rlugs la ni byi'u rug
T13D4312-2:326b-18: pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan ba gcin dang sbyar
T13D4312-2:326b-20: mgo bo'i bkru sman ba gcin dang sbyar ba legs
T13D4312-2:326b-21: par tshos pas dugs byas la rlig pa'i dbus kyi
T13D4312-2:326b-22: srubs mtshams lta bu ma gtogs par 'phel gtsags kyis
T13D4312-2:326b-23: dbral zhing gshags la de las tshil legs par dbyung
T13D4312-2:326b-24: zhing skyon med par byas la /
T13D4312-2:326b-25: de'i 'og tu rma sbrang rtsi la sogs pas bskus nas legs par brtse mas shing drub par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:326b-26: de la tshil ni sbyang ba'i phyir //
T13D4312-2:326b-27: ldong ros sug smel su ma na //
T13D4312-2:326b-28: go bye pi pi ling m'u la //
T13D4312-2:326b-29: til mar dag ni bsku bar bya //
T13D4312-2:326b-31: tshil las gyur pa'i rgyu rlugs de la tshil sbyang zhing dag par bya ba'i phyir /
T13D4312-2:326b-32: ldong ros la sogs pa bsku ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T13D4312-2:326b-33: rma ni 'byor bar gyur gyi bar //
T13D4312-2:326b-34: snum dang dugs kyang bsten par bya //
T13D4312-2:326b-36: rma 'byor bar gyur gyi bar du snum dang dugs dus rtag tu bsten par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:326b-37: gcin byung snum gyis dugs bya zhing //
T13D4312-2:326b-38: ras ma phra mos dkri bar bya //
T13D4312-2:326b-39: srubs mtshams 'og tu dmu rdzing bzhin //
T13D4312-2:326b-40: legs par dbral te gzags par bya //
T13D4312-2:326b-41: rma bkag bcing dang 'byor bar bya /
T13D4312-2:326b-43: gcin las gyur pa'i rgyu rlugs kyi nad ni snum
T13D4312-2:326b-44: gyi sman gyis dugs byas la de'i 'og tu ras
T13D4312-2:326b-45: kyi chal pa phra mos dkris la srubs mtshams kyi
T13D4312-2:326b-46: 'og tu dmu rdzing gi dpyad ji ltar bya ba
T13D4312-2:326b-47: bzhin du 'bras kyi rtse mo lta bu'i gtsags bus
T13D4312-2:326b-48: phug la de legs par 'dzag tu gzhug par bya'o
T13D4312-2:327a-1: de'i 'og tu bkag nas sgye'u lta bu'i bcing bas
T13D4312-2:327a-2: dkris la de rma gso ba'i cho gas de 'byor
T13D4312-2:327a-3: bar bya'o // rgyu ma byung bar gyur pa dag / rlig par phyin par ma gyur la //
T13D4312-2:327a-4: rlung gi rgyu rlugs bzhin du gso //
T13D4312-2:327a-6: rgyu ma byung ba las gyur pa'i rgyu rlugs la
T13D4312-2:327a-7: ni rlig pa'i gnas su phyin par ma gyur gyi
T13D4312-2:327a-8: bar du rlung gi rgyu rlugs ltar de gso bar
T13D4312-2:327a-9: bya'o // ba spru ba ni srang brgya dang //
T13D4312-2:327a-10: rtsa ba bcu pa ae randa //
T13D4312-2:327a-11: aa shva gan dha nye'u shing dang //
T13D4312-2:327a-12: pa ya sya dang d'ur ba gnyis //
T13D4312-2:327a-13: 'dam bu ku sha bu ram shing //
T13D4312-2:327a-14: aa ta ga lar bcas pa ni //
T13D4312-2:327a-15: re re srang ni bcu bcu byas //
T13D4312-2:327a-16: cha bre brgya rtsa nyi shu brgyad //
T13D4312-2:327a-17: bskol la brgyad cha lus pa ru //
T13D4312-2:327a-18: der ni bu ram srang sum cu //
T13D4312-2:327a-19: ae randa yi mar bre do //
T13D4312-2:327a-20: 'o ma mar ni bre do do //
T13D4312-2:327a-21: pi pi ling dang de rtsa ba //
T13D4312-2:327a-22: shing mngar rgun 'bru lce myong tsha //
T13D4312-2:327a-23: la la phud dang dong gra gzhug / de btsos skyid de ba zhes bya //
T13D4312-2:327a-24: gzhon sha can gyi bcud len yin //
T13D4312-2:327a-25: rlung dang than pa lam du 'gro //
T13D4312-2:327a-26: bzhon sogs bsrung ba bsdams mi dgos //
T13D4312-2:327a-27: skyid de ba dad phyug po dang //
T13D4312-2:327a-28: bde ba bsten dang bud med dang //
T13D4312-2:327a-29: bud med rgan mo'i khyo dang ni //
T13D4312-2:327a-30: dpal skyed rtsod pa zlog byed cing //
T13D4312-2:327a-31: dus kun du ni brten gyur na //
T13D4312-2:327a-32: mdog mdangs sha ni rgyas byed cing //
T13D4312-2:327a-34: pho mtshan mo mtshan rlung gis nyen //
T13D4312-2:327a-35: 'or nad dmu rdzing mchin pa dang //
T13D4312-2:327a-36: rtug skam nad ni sel byed mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-2:327a-37: ba spru ba zhes bya ba pu rna rna ba srang brgya /

T13D4312-2:336a-44: skran gyi nad pa la snum gyi cho ga byas

T13D4312-2:336a-46: par byas pas skran de snyi zhing lhod par gyur
T13D4312-2:336a-47: pa dang / sngar mdo'i gnas su ji skad bshad
T13D4312-2:336a-48: pa'i bum pa bzhag cing glan la des bsdus shing
T13D4312-2:336a-49: bkang la de'i 'og tu bum pa de bsal cing
T13D4312-2:336b-1: / de nas ras nang chud byas te //
T13D4312-2:336b-2: tshad shes pa yis skran dbral bya //
T13D4312-2:336b-4: de nas de'i 'og tu skran 'bur ba de ras
T13D4312-2:336b-5: kyis dkri zhing bsdams te de'i nang du chud par
T13D4312-2:336b-6: byas la skran gyi tshad ji tsam pa shes pa'i
T13D4312-2:336b-7: sman pas skran de dbral zhing gshags par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:336b-8: shing bcad ra rmi me long rnams //
T13D4312-2:336b-9: ji rnyed pa yis legs par bcing //
T13D4312-2:336b-11: de'i 'og tu shing gi lham mkhan la sogs pa'i shing gi spyad pags pa 'byar bar byed pa'am /
T13D4312-2:336b-12: yang na ra'i rmig pa zhes bya ba'i cha byad
T13D4312-2:336b-13: dam me long gang yang rung ba ji rnyed pas
T13D4312-2:336b-14: ras kyi nang du legs par dam du bcing bar
T13D4312-2:336b-15: bya'o // des skran gcig pu dbyi bya zhing //
T13D4312-2:336b-16: snying dang rgyu mar reg mi bya //
T13D4312-2:336b-18: shing spyad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba des skran gcig pu phyi zhing sbyang par bya'i /
T13D4312-2:336b-19: nang gi snying dang rgyu ma la ni reg par mi bya'o //
T13D4312-2:336b-20: til dang zar ma'i sa bon dang //
T13D4312-2:336b-21: yungs kar ae randa yis byug / bad kan skran ni lcags kyi snod //
T13D4312-2:336b-24: de'i 'og tu til la sogs pa'i lde gus bad
T13D4312-2:336b-25: kan las gyur pa'i skran dbral la de la byugs
T13D4312-2:336b-26: la / lcags kyi snod yud tsam dro bar byas pas dugs bya'o //
T13D4312-2:336b-27: de ltar gnas las bskyod nas ni //
T13D4312-2:336b-28: bad kan skran la snum bcas pa'i //
T13D4312-2:336b-29: bkru sman dang ni 'jam rtsi dag / rtsa ba bcu pa ldan par sbyar //
T13D4312-2:336b-31: de ltar rim pa 'dis bad kan las gyur pa'i
T13D4312-2:336b-32: skran gnas las bskyod cing g-yo bar byas la snyi
T13D4312-2:336b-33: bar gyur nas snum dang ldan pa'i bkru sman gyis
T13D4312-2:336b-34: sbyang bar bya zhing rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs
T13D4312-2:336b-35: pa'i 'jam rtsis kyang de sbyang bar bya'o ;
T13D4312-2:336b-36: / pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra //
T13D4312-2:336b-37: rgun 'bru sha ma dur byid sogs //
T13D4312-2:336b-38: srang re dang ni bskol ba la //
T13D4312-2:336b-39: ae randa yi zhun mar ni //
T13D4312-2:336b-41: lhan cig bskol bar gyur pa 'di //
T13D4312-2:336b-42: 'dres pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste //
T13D4312-2:336b-43: skran can 'khru bar byed pa'i mchog / rgyu rlugs khong 'bras gzer dang ni //
T13D4312-2:336b-44: rlung gi nad la bdud rtsi yin //
T13D4312-2:336b-46: pi pi ling la sogs pa dang dur byid la sogs pa ste /
T13D4312-2:336b-47: dur byid dang dan da dang ban da la sogs pa srang re re dang /
T13D4312-2:336b-48: ae randa'i mar bre gang zhun mar bre gang 'o
T13D4312-2:336b-49: ma bre drug 'gyur dang bsres te bskol bar gyur
T13D4312-2:337a-1: pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste /
T13D4312-2:337a-2: des ni skran can dag mchog tu 'khru bar byed
T13D4312-2:337a-3: pa yin zhing rgyu rlugs la sogs pa'i nad la
T13D4312-2:337a-4: bdud rtsi ltar phan pa yin pas bdud rtsi yin
T13D4312-2:337a-5: no zhes bya'o // yang na ni li ni sman mar //
T13D4312-2:337a-6: srang gnyis tshad du blud pa'am //
T13D4312-2:337a-7: de bzhin skyid de ba'i sman mar /
T13D4312-2:337a-8: dmu rdzing skabs bshad mar yang phan //
T13D4312-2:337a-10: yang na ni li ni'i sman mar sngar bshad pa
T13D4312-2:337a-11: las srang gnyis kyi tshad tsam du blud de 'khrur
T13D4312-2:337a-12: gzhug par bya'o // de bzhin du skyid de ba'i
T13D4312-2:337a-13: sman mar rgyu rlugs kyi skabs su bshad pa srang
T13D4312-2:337a-14: gnyis kyi tshad du blud cing yang na dmu rdzing
T13D4312-2:337a-15: gi skabs su bshad pa'i sman mar srang gnyis blud
T13D4312-2:337a-16: la 'khrur bcug na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:337a-17: dan da tsi tra aa ru ra //
T13D4312-2:337a-18: srang ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga //
T13D4312-2:337a-19: chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol //
T13D4312-2:337a-20: brgyad cha lus btsags aa ru ra //
T13D4312-2:337a-21: bcas pa bu ram dan dar mnyam //
T13D4312-2:337a-22: bcug la til mar dur byid phye //
T13D4312-2:337a-23: srang bzhi bca' sga pi pi ling ;
T13D4312-2:337a-24: / zho gnyis bskol bsgrangs lde gu de //
T13D4312-2:337a-25: sbrang rtsi til mar cha mnyam pa //
T13D4312-2:337a-26: dri sna bzhi bzhi srang re gzhug / de las aa ru ra gcig dang //
T13D4312-2:337a-27: lde gu srang gcig bcas zos na //
T13D4312-2:337a-28: bde bar nad ni bre gang 'khru //
T13D4312-2:337a-29: skran dang snying nad gzhang 'brum nad //
T13D4312-2:337a-30: 'or nad lto sngos sbyar ba'i dug /
T13D4312-2:337a-31: mdze dang dmu rdzing nad glongs dang //
T13D4312-2:337a-32: yi ga 'chus dang mcher pa'i nad //
T13D4312-2:337a-33: skya rbab mig ser 'joms par byed //
T13D4312-2:337a-34: 'di ni dan da tsi tra ka / aa ru ra yi lde gu yin //
T13D4312-2:337a-36: dan da'i rtsa bsrang nyi shu rtsa lnga dang tsi
T13D4312-2:337a-37: tra ka srang nyi shu rtsa lnga chu bre bcu
T13D4312-2:337a-38: drug ces bya ba srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis
T13D4312-2:337a-40: de las bre do lus pa'i khu ba btsags te /
T13D4312-2:337a-41: aa ru ra dang bcas pa'i bu ram dan da
T13D4312-2:337a-42: dang mnyam par srang nyi shu rtsa lnga bcug pa
T13D4312-2:337a-43: dang til mar srang bzhi dang dur byid kyi phye
T13D4312-2:337a-44: ma srang bzhi / bca' sga dang pi pi ling
T13D4312-2:337a-45: zho gnyis gnyis bcug la me chung dus bskol te
T13D4312-2:337a-46: ma srang bzhi / / lde gur gyur pa de
T13D4312-2:337a-47: phab ste bsgrangs pa'i nad du sbrang rtsi til mar
T13D4312-2:337a-48: dang cha mnyam pa srang bzhi bcug la dri sna
T13D4312-2:337a-49: bzhi la srang re re ste /
T13D4312-2:337a-50: srang bzhi bcug la lde gu de las aa ru
T13D4312-2:337a-51: ra re dang lde gu srang gcig dang bcas pa
T13D4312-2:337a-52: zos na bde zhing nad med par snum gyis zhen
T13D4312-2:337a-53: par gyur pas na bre gang tsam 'khru zhing 'byung
T13D4312-2:337a-54: bar 'gyur ro // dan da dang aa ru ra
T13D4312-2:337b-0: des @337b ni skran dang snying nad la sogs pa
T13D4312-2:337b-2: su dh'a kshi ra'i rlan dang ni //
T13D4312-2:337b-3: dur byid dang ni legs bsres te //
T13D4312-2:337b-4: mar dang sbrang rtsi zho gnyis bcas //
T13D4312-2:337b-7: dur byid kyi phye ma su dh'a kshi ra'i 'o
T13D4312-2:337b-8: ma dang bsres shing spangs la mar dang sbrang rtsi
T13D4312-2:337b-9: zho gnyis dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na yang
T13D4312-2:337b-10: legs par bde blag kho nar 'khru bar 'gyur ro
T13D4312-2:337b-11: // ru rta dur byid aa ru ra //
T13D4312-2:337b-12: dan da gu gul nas tshig 'khus //
T13D4312-2:337b-13: ba gcin bcas blud yang na ni //
T13D4312-2:337b-14: gu gul nyi tshe ba gcin blud //
T13D4312-2:337b-16: dur byid la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang sbyar
T13D4312-2:337b-17: te 'khru sman gyi don du blud par bya ba'am
T13D4312-2:337b-18: / yang na gu gul nyi tshe ba gcin dang sbyar te blud na yang 'khru bar byed do //
T13D4312-2:337b-19: cho ga grub pa las bshad pa'i //
T13D4312-2:337b-20: bkru sman drag po skran 'joms gtang //
T13D4312-2:337b-22: yang na cho ga grub pa'i skabs nas bshad pa'i
T13D4312-2:337b-23: mas gtong ba'i bkru sman drag po skran 'joms par
T13D4312-2:337b-24: byed pa yang gtang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:337b-25: rtsa ba zug cing lhun che la //
T13D4312-2:337b-26: sra zhing lci la tshor ba med //
T13D4312-2:337b-27: gting ring ma smin pa yi skran //
T13D4312-2:337b-28: thal sman dang ni chang rnying dang //
T13D4312-2:337b-29: me yi las kyis bsal bar bya //
T13D4312-2:337b-31: skran rtsa ba zug pa ste dngos po gcig tu chags pa dang /
T13D4312-2:337b-32: lhun che zhing stug pa dang mnyen bag med cing sra ba dang khur ltar lci ba dang /
T13D4312-2:337b-33: tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'dug pa dang /
T13D4312-2:337b-34: gting ring zhing sha'i nang du zug pa dang /
T13D4312-2:337b-35: smin par ma gyur pa'i skran la thal sman rnon po btang ba dang /
T13D4312-2:337b-36: chang rnying pa btang ba dang /
T13D4312-2:337b-37: mes bsreg pa'i las kyis de bsal zhing gzhom par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:337b-38: bad kan shas che thal sman ni //
T13D4312-2:337b-39: gzhang 'brum rde'u dang pho ba'i nad //
T13D4312-2:337b-40: gso ba'i skabs bshad gtang bya zhing //
T13D4312-2:337b-41: zhag gcig zhag gnyis kyis chod ba //
T13D4312-2:337b-42: yang na zhag gsum ngal bsos la //
T13D4312-2:337b-43: lus kyi nyams stobs nad dag ni //
T13D4312-2:337b-46: bad kan gyi shas che ba'i skran la ni /
T13D4312-2:337b-47: thal sman rnon po gzhang 'brum gso ba la sogs
T13D4312-2:337b-48: pa'i skabs su bshad pa gang dag yin pa de
T13D4312-2:337b-49: zhag gcig gis chod cing ngal bsos te gtong ba'am
T13D4312-2:338a-0: / zhag gnyis sam gsum gyis bar @338a * //
T13D4312-2:338a-1: chod cing lus kyi nyams stobs 'phel bar bya ba
T13D4312-2:338a-2: dang nad 'bri bar byed pa la sman pas brtson
T13D4312-2:338a-4: thang shing dur byid dan da dang //
T13D4312-2:338a-5: pu tse shel dang tsha ba lnga //
T13D4312-2:338a-6: sva rdzi ka thal nas tshig 'khus //
T13D4312-2:338a-7: pa tha dang ni 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-2:338a-8: ru rta bas ra su gan dha ;
T13D4312-2:338a-9: / zi ra nag po srang phyed phyed //
T13D4312-2:338a-10: lan tsha lnga ni srang re dag / btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang //
T13D4312-2:338a-11: zhag dang zho dang mar dang sbrus //
T13D4312-2:338a-12: rdza mar du ba ma shor bsreg / rdza ma me mdog 'gyur de yi //
T13D4312-2:338a-13: thal ba blangs pa 'o ma mar //
T13D4312-2:338a-14: dar ba chang sogs sbyar te blud //
T13D4312-2:338a-15: skran dang rtug 'gags rgyu rlugs dang //
T13D4312-2:338a-16: gzhang 'brum dmu rdzing pho ba'i nad //
T13D4312-2:338a-17: srin nad brjed byed smyo byed gdon //
T13D4312-2:338a-18: mngal nad khu chu las gyur rde'u //
T13D4312-2:338a-19: byi la sprul gyi dug rnams kyang //
T13D4312-2:338a-20: thal ba'i sman 'dis sel bar byed //
T13D4312-2:338a-22: thang shing la sogs pa nas zir nag po'i bar
T13D4312-2:338a-23: du srang phyed phyed dang lan tshva lnga srang re
T13D4312-2:338a-24: re thams cad btags pa'i phye ma til la sogs
T13D4312-2:338a-25: pa dang sprus te rdza bum gyi nang du dri
T13D4312-2:338a-26: ma shor bar legs par bsregs te rdza ma de
T13D4312-2:338a-27: me'i mdog can du dmar por gyur pa dang /
T13D4312-2:338a-28: thal sman blangs la 'o ma la sogs pa dang ci rigs sbyar te blud na phan no //
T13D4312-2:338a-29: thal ba'i sman 'di skran la sogs pa'i nad dang /
T13D4312-2:338a-30: byi ba la sogs pa'i du gsel cing 'jig par byed do //
T13D4312-2:338a-31: bad kan las gyur skran la snum //
T13D4312-2:338a-32: sha khu 'o ma mar bsten la //
T13D4312-2:338a-33: thal sman btang na skran dag ni //
T13D4312-2:338a-34: gnas nas dum bu dum bu ru //
T13D4312-2:338a-35: bcad nas thur du 'byin par byed //
T13D4312-2:338a-37: bad kan las gyur pa'i skran la ni thal sman ya baksha ra zhes bya ba dang /
T13D4312-2:338a-38: snum la sogs pa bsten pas khong pa'i gnas las
T13D4312-2:338a-39: dum bu dum bu'i tshul du bcad cing gtubs te
T13D4312-2:338a-40: thur du 'khru zhing 'byin par byed do //
T13D4312-2:338a-41: me drod chung zhing yi ga 'chus //
T13D4312-2:338a-42: chang goms snum bcas bza' ba la //
T13D4312-2:338a-43: rgyun srang dag phyir mnan chang dang //
T13D4312-2:338a-44: chang rnying skyon med blud par bya //
T13D4312-2:338a-46: me drod chung ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i
T13D4312-2:338a-47: mi la bu ga rgyun srang dag cing bsal bar
T13D4312-2:338a-48: bya ba'i phyir / sman gyi sbyor ba la sogs pa dang /
T13D4312-2:338a-49: mnan pa'i chang aa sa ba 'am /
T13D4312-2:338a-50: chang rnying skyon med cing legs par langs pa dag blud par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:338b-0: s'a lu drug cu pa @338b rnying pa //
T13D4312-2:338b-1: rgya sran skam sa'i srog chags sha //
T13D4312-2:338b-2: tsi tra pu ti ka ranydza //
T13D4312-2:338b-3: aag ni man ta la la bud //
T13D4312-2:338b-4: pa ra na yi myu gu dang //
T13D4312-2:338b-5: shi bru bi la ba gzhon nu dang //
T13D4312-2:338b-6: la phug gzhon nu skam po dang //
T13D4312-2:338b-7: kha lung shing kun star bu dang //
T13D4312-2:338b-9: tsha ba gsum dang dar ba dang //
T13D4312-2:338b-10: mar dang til mar kha zas sbyin //
T13D4312-2:338b-12: s'a lu rtsa snar la sogs pa'o //
T13D4312-2:338b-13: drug cu ba dag ni 'bras kyi rnam pa ste /
T13D4312-2:338b-14: de dag kyang lo gcig lon zhing rnying par gyur pa dang /
T13D4312-2:338b-16: skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha dang tsi tra ka la sogs pa'i myu gu gzhon nu dang /
T13D4312-2:338b-17: shi kru la sogs pha dag kyang bza' ba dang /
T13D4312-2:338b-18: yu sha la sogs pa'i don du ci rigs pa sbyin par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:338b-19: btung bar chang gi dangs ma dang //
T13D4312-2:338b-20: skyur rtsabs dar ba zhog chu //
T13D4312-2:338b-21: bid la la phud phye ma //
T13D4312-2:338b-22: rtsa ba lnga bskol khu ba'am //
T13D4312-2:338b-23: rgun chang rnying pa blud par bya //
T13D4312-2:338b-25: de la btung ba'i don chang dangs ma la sogs
T13D4312-2:338b-26: pa bad kan las gyur pa'i skran can gyi nad
T13D4312-2:338b-28: pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba //
T13D4312-2:338b-29: go snyod rgyam tsha kru trug tres //
T13D4312-2:338b-30: chang gi snyigs mar bsres pa yis //
T13D4312-2:338b-31: skran ni myur du sel bar byed //
T13D4312-2:338b-34: pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la sogs pa dang
T13D4312-2:338b-35: chang gi snyigs ma 'og tu lus pa dang sbyar
T13D4312-2:338b-36: te blud na yang skran sel bar byed do //
T13D4312-2:338b-37: slon dang smyung ba dugs dang ni //
T13D4312-2:338b-38: sman mar blud dang bkru sman dang //
T13D4312-2:338b-39: 'jam rtsi thal sman mnan chang dang //
T13D4312-2:338b-40: chang rnying ri lu phan zas kyis //
T13D4312-2:338b-41: bad kan skran can gting zug pas //
T13D4312-2:338b-42: gal te zhi bar ma gyur na //
T13D4312-2:338b-43: de la khrag dbyung tha mar ni //
T13D4312-2:338b-44: mde'u lcags sogs kyis bsreg par bya //
T13D4312-2:338b-46: bad kan las gyur pa'i skran la slon sman la
T13D4312-2:338b-47: sogs pa btang bar gyur kyang de'i nang du gting
T13D4312-2:338b-48: zug pa'i rgyus zhi zhing byang bar ma gyur na
T13D4312-2:338b-49: / de la khrag dbyung ba'i sbyor ba byas nas
T13D4312-2:338b-50: de'i rjes la mde'u lcags la sogs bas legs par
T13D4312-2:338b-51: / bsreg par bya'o // de nas skran ni mthar thug par //
T13D4312-2:338b-52: sman pas dos kyis dkris nas ni //
T13D4312-2:338b-53: lte ba chu so rgyu ma snying //
T13D4312-2:338b-54: spu yi phreng ni ma gtogs par //
T13D4312-2:338b-55: shin tu gting thug ma yin par //
T13D4312-2:338b-56: mde'u bsregs pa'am yang na ni //
T13D4312-2:339a-0: gzong bu'i lcags ni bsreg pa @339a * //
T13D4312-2:339a-2: tin du ka yi shing gis bsreg / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-2:339a-3: de nas bsreg pa'i tshul ni skran gyi mtha' ci
T13D4312-2:339a-4: tsam yod pa nas gos kyis legs par dkris shing
T13D4312-2:339a-5: bsdams la sman pas lte ba dang chu so la
T13D4312-2:339a-6: sogs pa dag tu ma reg cing gting thug par
T13D4312-2:339a-7: sleb par ma gyur par mde'u sa bsreg pa'am /

T13D4312-2:339a-9: bas de sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsreg
T13D4312-2:339a-10: par bya'o // de nas bsil bas me dbal ni //
T13D4312-2:339a-11: zhi nas rma ltar gso bar bya //
T13D4312-2:339a-13: de nas de'i 'og tu kha ba dang /
T13D4312-2:339a-15: skyur ba'i bag bsil bar gyur pas mes bsregs pa'i
T13D4312-2:339a-16: me de zhi zhing med par byas nas de'i 'og
T13D4312-2:339a-17: tu rma gso ba'i tshul du gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:339a-18: ma zhu rjes 'brel smyung byas nas //
T13D4312-2:339a-19: thug pa sogs kyis me drod skyed //
T13D4312-2:339a-20: rang rang rim dang 'dres pa la //
T13D4312-2:339a-21: 'dren pa'i gso bas gso bar bya //
T13D4312-2:339a-23: nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa'i skran ma
T13D4312-2:339a-24: zhu ba dang rjes 'brel cing smin par gyur pa
T13D4312-2:339a-25: la ni dang por smyung ba byas nas /
T13D4312-2:339a-26: de'i 'og tu thug pa la sogs bas pho ba'i
T13D4312-2:339a-27: me drod skyed cing rang rang gi gso ba'i rim
T13D4312-2:339a-29: nad gzhi 'dres pa las gyur pa dang ldan ba dang /
T13D4312-2:339a-30: 'dus pa'i nad la ni sngar ji skad smos pa'i
T13D4312-2:339a-31: gso ba de dag las 'dren ma'i tshul gyis gso
T13D4312-2:339a-33: bcas pa'i dus ni 'das gyur pa'i //
T13D4312-2:339a-34: bud med la skran khrag skyes 'byung //
T13D4312-2:339a-35: de la lus snum dugs byas par //
T13D4312-2:339a-36: snum gyi bkru sman gtang bar bya //
T13D4312-2:339a-38: khrag las gyur pa'i skran dag ni bud med btsas pa'i dus te /
T13D4312-2:339a-39: mngal du chags nas zla ba bcu 'das pa yan chad 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T13D4312-2:339a-40: de lta bu de la ni lus la snum pa
T13D4312-2:339a-41: dang dugs kyi cho ga dang por byas nas snum
T13D4312-2:339a-42: can gyi bkru sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:339a-43: til bskol mar dang bu ram dang //
T13D4312-2:339a-44: tsha gsum ga bra'i rtsa ba'i phye //
T13D4312-2:339a-45: khrag las gyur pa'i skran dang ni //
T13D4312-2:339a-46: bud med zla mtshan med la blud //
T13D4312-2:339a-48: khrag las gyur pa'i skran dang bud med zla mtshan dus su ma byung na /
T13D4312-2:339a-49: nang du mar la sogs pa btab pa blud na phan no //
T13D4312-2:339a-50: ga bra'i rtsa ba pi pi ling //
T13D4312-2:339a-51: thang shing ka ranydza'i shun pa //
T13D4312-2:339a-52: pi pi ling gi rtsa ba yi //
T13D4312-2:339a-53: phye ma til bskol chur sbyar ba //
T13D4312-2:339b-0: blud na phrag skran nad sel @339b byed ;
T13D4312-2:339b-2: ga dra'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i phye ma til
T13D4312-2:339b-3: bskol ba'i chu dang blud na yang khrag la sogs
T13D4312-2:339b-5: pa la sha yi thal ba ni //
T13D4312-2:339b-6: bre brgyad til mar mar bre brgyad //
T13D4312-2:339b-7: bskol te tshad bzhin blud na ni //
T13D4312-2:339b-8: skran ni snyi bar byed pa yin //
T13D4312-2:339b-10: pa la sha bsregs pa'i thal ba'i khu ba gzags
T13D4312-2:339b-11: pa bre brgyad dang de bzhin du til mar dang
T13D4312-2:339b-12: mar spyir bre brgyad bsres te bskol la ji lta
T13D4312-2:339b-13: ba bzhin du blud na bud med kyi khrag las
T13D4312-2:339b-14: gyur pa'i skran snyi bar byed cing lhod par 'gyur
T13D4312-2:339b-15: ba yin no // gal te snyi bar ma gyur na //
T13D4312-2:339b-16: mngal gyi bkru sman gtang bar bya //
T13D4312-2:339b-17: til gyi lde gu thal sman bcas //
T13D4312-2:339b-18: yang na su dh'a kshi rar sbyar //
T13D4312-2:339b-20: de ltar byas par gyur kyang khrag las gyur pa'i
T13D4312-2:339b-21: skran de snyi zhing zhig par ma gyur na mngal
T13D4312-2:339b-22: gyi sgo nas bkru sman gtang ba'i til btags ba'i
T13D4312-2:339b-23: lde gu nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar
T13D4312-2:339b-24: ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya ba'am /
T13D4312-2:339b-25: yang na til mar gyi lde gu dang su dh'a
T13D4312-2:339b-26: kshi ra dang sbyar ba'i mngal gyi bkru sman gtang
T13D4312-2:339b-27: bar bya'o // yang na de gnyis dang bsres pa'i //
T13D4312-2:339b-28: nya ni kha bo gtang bar bya //
T13D4312-2:339b-30: yang na nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /
T13D4312-2:339b-31: su dh'a kshi ra dang sbyar ba nya kha bo
T13D4312-2:339b-32: zhes bya ba nya'i phru gu sbyar ba'i bkru sman
T13D4312-2:339b-33: mngal gyi sgo nas gtang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:339b-34: phag rgod nya yi mkhris pa yis //
T13D4312-2:339b-35: bsgos pa'i ras ma gzhug par bya //
T13D4312-2:339b-37: phag rgod dang nya'i mkhris pa gnyis bsgos shing de
T13D4312-2:339b-38: la spangs pa'i ras ma rnams zhes bya ba gos
T13D4312-2:339b-39: kyi du ma bu gzhug bar bya'o //
T13D4312-2:339b-40: yang na bu ram thal sman gnyis //
T13D4312-2:339b-41: phabs sbyar mngal ni spyang phyir gtang //
T13D4312-2:339b-43: yang na mngal nad sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir bu ram dang thal sman gnyis dang phabs sbyar te /
T13D4312-2:339b-45: khrag mkhris sel ba'i thal sman ni //
T13D4312-2:339b-46: sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin //
T13D4312-2:339b-48: khrag dang mkhris pa sel cing thal sman autpa la'i
T13D4312-2:339b-49: sdong bu la sogs pa bsres pa gang yin pa
T13D4312-2:339b-50: dang / sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:339b-51: sgog skya'i chang ni rnon po dang //
T13D4312-2:339b-52: nya yang de la sbyin par bya //
T13D4312-2:339b-54: yang bud med de la sgog skya la sogs pa byin na yang phan no //
T13D4312-2:340a-2: 'o ma ba gcin mas gtang bya //
T13D4312-2:340a-4: yang na rtsab bcu pa bskol ba dang 'o ma dang sbyar ba mas gtong ba gong ma 'am /
T13D4312-2:340a-5: rtsa ba bcu ba dang thal sman sbyar ba mas gtong ba'am /
T13D4312-2:340a-6: rtsa ba bcu dang bcas pa ba gcin mas gtong ba gong ma yang bya'o //
T13D4312-2:340a-7: des kyang khrag 'dzag ma gyur na //
T13D4312-2:340a-8: skran 'jig byed pa'i sbyor ba phan //
T13D4312-2:340a-10: sbyor ba de dag kyang khrag 'dzag cing zla mtshan
T13D4312-2:340a-11: mi snang na skran 'jig par byed pa'i sman sbyor
T13D4312-2:340a-12: bar bya'o // byung nas mar dang til mar bsku //
T13D4312-2:340a-13: gcad pa dag ni mi bya zhing //
T13D4312-2:340a-14: sha khu 'bras chan bza' ba dang //
T13D4312-2:340a-15: btung ba chang ni sar pa blud //
T13D4312-2:340a-17: zla mtshan gyi khrag de byung bar gyur nas ni
T13D4312-2:340a-18: zhun mar gyis de'i lus la bsku bar bya zhing
T13D4312-2:340a-19: / khrag dbyung ba de mi gcad par btang snyoms su bzhag la /
T13D4312-2:340a-20: sha khu dang 'bras chan du sbyar ba sbyin cing chang sar ba blud par bya'o //
T13D4312-2:340a-21: khrag ni shas cher byung gyur na //
T13D4312-2:340a-22: khrag mkhris sel ba'i gso ba bya //
T13D4312-2:340a-24: de ltar khrag byung ba las shas cher rgal zhing mang du byung na /
T13D4312-2:340a-25: khrag mkhris bsal ba'i gso ba ji skad bshad pa dag bya'o //
T13D4312-2:340a-26: rlung gi nad kyis nyen gyur na //
T13D4312-2:340a-27: rlung gi gso ba kun kyang bya //
T13D4312-2:340a-28: lto spos sogs dang rtug skam la //
T13D4312-2:340a-29: rlung bsal gso ba ji bzhin bya //
T13D4312-2:340a-31: bud med de rkyen de las de rlung nad skyes par gyur na ni /
T13D4312-2:340a-32: rlung bsal cing 'joms pa'i ji skad smos pa thams cad bya'o //
T13D4312-2:340a-33: gal te de lto spos pa dang rlung nad gtun
T13D4312-2:340a-34: 'dra ba dang rtug pa 'gags pa la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-2:340a-35: nad la ni rtug skam gso ba'i sbyor ba ji
T13D4312-2:340a-37: sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snyed po'i rnam par
T13D4312-2:340a-38: 'grel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya
T13D4312-2:340a-39: ba / slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges bar sbyar ba las /
